Public Function IndexOf (value As String) As Integer
public: int IndexOf(System::String ^ value);

param.name: value
param.span: 要搜寻的字符串。

span.span: The string to seek.

summary.span: 报告指定字符串在此实例中的第一个匹配项的从零开始的索引。

span.span: Reports the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified string in this instance.

returns.span: 如果找到该字符串，则为 的从零开始的索引位置；如果未找到该字符串，则为 -1。

span.span: The zero-based index position of if that string is found, or -1 if it is not.

returns.span: 如果 为 ，则返回值为 0。

span.span: If is , the return value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引号从零开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 此方法执行使用当前区域性的单词 （区分大小写和区分区域性的） 搜索。This method performs a word (case-sensitive and culture-sensitive) search using the current culture. 搜索此实例的第一个字符位置开始，将继续，直到最后一个字符位置。The search begins at the first character position of this instance and continues until the last character position. 字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的比较时该字符不被考虑。Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive comparison. 在区分区域性的搜索中，如果 `value` 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。In a culture-sensitive search, if `value` contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed. 如果`value`仅由一个或多个可忽略字符，组成方法始终返回 0 （零），以指示当前实例的开头，找到匹配项。If `value` consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns 0 (zero) to indicate that the match is found at the beginning of the current instance. 在下面的示例中，方法用于在两个字符串中找到三个子字符串 （软连字符 (U + 00AD)、 软连字符后跟"n"和软连字符后跟"m"）。In the following example, the method is used to find three substrings (a soft hyphen (U+00AD), a soft hyphen followed by "n", and a soft hyphen followed by "m") in two strings. 只有一个字符串包含软连字符。Only one of the strings contains a soft hyphen. 如果在上运行该示例[!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)]或更高版本，在每个情况下，因为软连字符是一个可忽略字符，因此结果是相同就像该软连字符不包含在`value`。If the example is run on the [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] or later, in each case, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the result is the same as if the soft hyphen had not been included in `value`. 当搜索时软连字符，该方法将返回 0 （零），以指示它已在该字符串的开头找到了匹配项。When searching for a soft hyphen only, the method returns 0 (zero) to indicate that it has found a match at the beginning of the string. [!code-csharp[System.String.IndexOf#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.IndexOf/CS/ignorable21.cs#21)] [!code-vb[System.String.IndexOf#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.IndexOf/VB/ignorable21.vb#21)] ## Examples 下面的示例中搜索"动物"中的"n"。The following example searches for the "n" in "animal". 因为字符串索引开始，以零，而不是一个方法指示的"n"是否在位置 1。Because string indexes begin at zero rather than one, the method indicates that the "n" is at position 1. [!code-cpp[System.String.IndexOf#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.IndexOf/CPP/simple1.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[System.String.IndexOf#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.IndexOf/CS/simple1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.String.IndexOf#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.IndexOf/VB/simple1.vb#12)] 下面的示例使用方法来确定动物的名称的句子中的起始位置。The following example uses the method to determine the starting position of an animal name in a sentence. 它然后使用此位置插入一个句子描述动物的形容词。It then uses this position to insert an adjective that describes the animal into the sentence. [!code-cpp[stringinsert#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/stringinsert/CPP/stringinsert.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[stringinsert#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/stringinsert/CS/stringinsert.cs#1)] [!code-vb[stringinsert#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/stringinsert/VB/stringinsert.vb#1)]

Public Function IndexOf (value As Char, startIndex As Integer) As Integer
public: int IndexOf(char value, int startIndex);

param.name: value
param.span: 要查找的 Unicode 字符。

span.span: A Unicode character to seek.

param.name: startIndex
param.span: 搜索起始位置。

span.span: The search starting position.

summary.span: 报告指定 Unicode 字符在此字符串中的第一个匹配项的从零开始的索引。

span.span: Reports the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified Unicode character in this string.

summary.span: 该搜索从指定字符位置开始。

span.span: The search starts at a specified character position.

returns.span: 如果找到该字符，则为从字符串的起始位置开始的 从零开始的索引位置；否则为 -1。

span.span: The zero-based index position of from the start of the string if that character is found, or -1 if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引号从 0 开始。Index numbering starts from 0. `startIndex` 参数可以介于 0 到字符串实例的长度。The `startIndex` parameter can range from 0 to the length of the string instance. 如果`startIndex`等于字符串实例的长度，则该方法返回-1。If `startIndex` equals the length of the string instance, the method returns -1. 搜索范围为从`startIndex`到字符串的末尾。The search ranges from `startIndex` to the end of the string. 此方法执行序号 （不区分区域性的） 搜索，其中一个字符被视为等效于另一个字符仅当其 Unicode 标量值都是相同。This method performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if their Unicode scalar values are the same. 若要执行区分区域性的搜索，使用方法，其中表示一个复合的字符，例如连字"Æ"(U + 00 C 6) 的 Unicode 标量值可能被视为等效于任何形式的字符中的组件更正序列，如"遍历"(U + 0041、 U + 0045)，则根据区域性。To perform a culture-sensitive search, use the method, where a Unicode scalar value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法。The following example demonstrates the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引号从 0 开始。Index numbering starts from 0. `startIndex` 参数可以介于 0 到字符串实例的长度。The `startIndex` parameter can range from 0 to the length of the string instance. 如果`startIndex`等于字符串实例的长度，则该方法返回-1。If `startIndex` equals the length of the string instance, the method returns -1. 此方法执行使用当前区域性的单词 （区分大小写和区分区域性的） 搜索。This method performs a word (case-sensitive and culture-sensitive) search using the current culture. 在开始执行搜索`startIndex`字符的此实例的位置，并将继续，直到最后一个字符位置。The search begins at the `startIndex` character position of this instance and continues until the last character position. 字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的比较时该字符不被考虑。Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive comparison. 在区分区域性的搜索中，如果 `value` 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。In a culture-sensitive search, if `value` contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed. 如果`value`仅由一个或多个可忽略字符，组成方法始终返回`startIndex`，即开始执行搜索的字符位置。If `value` consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns `startIndex`, which is the character position at which the search begins. 在下面的示例中，方法用于查找软连字符 (U + 00AD) 后跟"m"两个字符串中的位置。In the following example, the method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m" in two strings. 只有一个字符串包含必需的子字符串。Only one of the strings contains the required substring. 如果在上运行该示例[!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)]或更高版本，在这两种情况下，因为软连字符是一个可忽略字符，该方法返回的字符串中的"m"的索引。If the example is run on the [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] or later, in both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string. 注意对于第一个字符串，包含软连字符后跟“m”，该方法无法返回该软连字符的索引，而是返回“m”的索引。Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m". [!code-csharp[System.String.IndexOf#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.IndexOf/CS/ignorable22.cs#22)] [!code-vb[System.String.IndexOf#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.IndexOf/VB/ignorable22.vb#22)] ## Examples 下面的示例搜索指定字符串在目标字符串的所有匹配项。The following example searches for all occurrences of a specified string within a target string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引号从零开始。Index numbering starts from zero. `comparisonType`参数指定要搜索`value`参数使用当前或固定区域性、 使用区分大小写或不区分大小写搜索，以及使用 word 或序号比较规则。The `comparisonType` parameter specifies to search for the `value` parameter using the current or invariant culture, using a case-sensitive or case-insensitive search, and using word or ordinal comparison rules. ## Examples 以下 exampledemonstrates 三个重载的查找中使用的不同值的另一个字符串的字符串的第一个匹配项的方法枚举。The following exampledemonstrates three overloads of the method that find the first occurrence of a string within another string using different values of the enumeration. [!code-csharp[system.string.IndexOfCmp#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.IndexOfCmp/cs/iocmp.cs#1)] [!code-vb[system.string.IndexOfCmp#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.IndexOfCmp/vb/iocmp.vb#1)]

is not a valid value.

block.para:
字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的比较时该字符不被考虑。Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive comparison. 在区分区域性的搜索 (即，如果 不是 或 ) 中，如果 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。In a culture-sensitive search (that is, if is not or ), if contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed. 如果仅由一个或多个可忽略字符，组成方法始终返回 0 （零），以指示当前实例的开头，找到匹配项。If consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns 0 (zero) to indicate that the match is found at the beginning of the current instance.
在下面的示例中，方法用于在两个字符串中找到三个子字符串 （软连字符 (U + 00AD)、 软连字符后跟"n"和软连字符后跟"m"）。In the following example, the method is used to find three substrings (a soft hyphen (U+00AD), a soft hyphen followed by "n", and a soft hyphen followed by "m") in two strings. 只有一个字符串包含软连字符。Only one of the strings contains a soft hyphen. 如果在上运行该示例[!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)]或更高版本，因为软连字符是一个可忽略字符，则区分区域性的搜索返回的相同值，它将返回如果软连字符中不包含搜索字符串。If the example is run on the [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] or later, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, a culture-sensitive search returns the same value that it would return if the soft hyphen were not included in the search string. 序号搜索，但是，已成功在一个字符串中查找软连字符，并报告其不存在从第二个字符串。An ordinal search, however, successfully finds the soft hyphen in one string and reports that it is absent from the second string.
[!code-csharp[System.String.IndexOf#26](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.IndexOf/CS/ignorable26.cs#26)] [!code-vb[System.String.IndexOf#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.IndexOf/VB/ignorable26.vb#26)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引号从 0 开始。Index numbering starts from 0. `startIndex` 参数可以介于 0 到字符串实例的长度。The `startIndex` parameter can range from 0 to the length of the string instance. 如果`startIndex`等于字符串实例的长度，则该方法返回-1。If `startIndex` equals the length of the string instance, the method returns -1. `comparisonType`参数指定要搜索`value`参数使用当前或固定区域性、 使用区分大小写或不区分大小写搜索，以及使用 word 或序号比较规则。The `comparisonType` parameter specifies to search for the `value` parameter using the current or invariant culture, using a case-sensitive or case-insensitive search, and using word or ordinal comparison rules. ## Examples 以下 exampledemonstrates 三个重载的查找中使用的不同值的另一个字符串的字符串的第一个匹配项的方法枚举。The following exampledemonstrates three overloads of the method that find the first occurrence of a string within another string using different values of the enumeration. block.para:
字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的比较时该字符不被考虑。Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive comparison. 在区分区域性的搜索 (即，如果 不是 或 ) 中，如果 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。In a culture-sensitive search (that is, if is not or ), if contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed. 如果仅由一个或多个可忽略字符，组成方法始终返回，即开始执行搜索的字符位置。If consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns , which is the character position at which the search begins.
在下面的示例中，方法用于查找软连字符 (U + 00AD) 后跟"m"从两个字符串中的第三个字符位置开始的位置。In the following example, the method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m" starting with the third character position in two strings. 只有一个字符串包含必需的子字符串。如果在上运行该示例[!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)]或更高版本，在这两种情况下，因为软连字符是一个可忽略字符，该方法返回的字符串中的"m"的索引执行区分区域性的比较时。Only one of the strings contains the required substring.If the example is run on the [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] or later, in both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison. 注意对于第一个字符串，包含软连字符后跟“m”，该方法无法返回该软连字符的索引，而是返回“m”的索引。Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m". 只有当此方法执行序号比较时，它才会在第一个字符串中返回软连字符的索引。The method returns the index of the soft hyphen in the first string only when it performs an ordinal comparison.
[!code-csharp[System.String.IndexOf#25](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.IndexOf/CS/ignorable25.cs#25)] [!code-vb[System.String.IndexOf#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.IndexOf/VB/ignorable25.vb#25)]

字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的比较时该字符不被考虑。Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive comparison. 在区分区域性的搜索 (即，如果 不是 或 ) 中，如果 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。In a culture-sensitive search (that is, if is not or ), if contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed. 如果仅由一个或多个可忽略字符，组成方法始终返回，即开始执行搜索的字符位置。If consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns , which is the character position at which the search begins.
在下面的示例中，方法用于查找软连字符 (U + 00AD) 后跟"m"中第三到两个字符串中的第六个字符位置开始的位置。In the following example, the method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m" starting in the third through sixth character positions in two strings. 只有一个字符串包含必需的子字符串。Only one of the strings contains the required substring. 如果在上运行该示例[!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)]或更高版本，在这两种情况下，因为软连字符是一个可忽略字符，该方法返回的字符串中的"m"的索引执行区分区域性的比较时。If the example is run on the [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] or later, in both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison. 当它执行序号比较时，但是，它会查找子字符串仅在第一个字符串中。When it performs an ordinal comparison, however, it finds the substring only in the first string. 请注意，对于第一个字符串，包含软连字符后跟"m"，该方法无法返回该软连字符的索引，但执行区分区域性的比较时，而是返回"m"的索引。Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m" when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison. 只有当此方法执行序号比较时，它才会在第一个字符串中返回软连字符的索引。The method returns the index of the soft hyphen in the first string only when it performs an ordinal comparison.

Public Function IndexOfAny (anyOf As Char()) As Integer
public: int IndexOfAny(cli::array <char> ^ anyOf);

param.name: anyOf
param.span: Unicode 字符数组，包含一个或多个要查找的字符。

span.span: A Unicode character array containing one or more characters to seek.

summary.span: 报告指定 Unicode 字符数组中的任意字符在此实例中第一个匹配项的从零开始的索引。

span.span: Reports the zero-based index of the first occurrence in this instance of any character in a specified array of Unicode characters.

returns.span: 在此实例中第一次找到 中的任意字符的索引位置（从零开始）；如果未找到 中的字符，则为 -1。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引号从零开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 搜索`anyOf`区分大小写。The search for `anyOf` is case-sensitive. 如果`anyOf`为空数组，该字符串的开头匹配方法找到 （即，位于索引零）。If `anyOf` is an empty array, the method finds a match at the beginning of the string (that is, at index zero). 此方法执行序号 （不区分区域性的） 搜索，其中一个字符被视为等效于另一个字符仅当其 Unicode 标量值都是相同。This method performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if their Unicode scalar values are the same. 若要执行区分区域性的搜索，使用方法，其中表示一个复合的字符，例如连字"Æ"(U + 00 C 6) 的 Unicode 标量值可能被视为等效于任何形式的字符中的组件更正序列，如"遍历"(U + 0041、 U + 0045)，则根据区域性。To perform a culture-sensitive search, use the method, where a Unicode scalar value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. ## Examples 下面的示例查找字符串中的第一个元音标记。The following example finds the first vowel in a string. MemberSignature.Value: public static string Intern (string str);

Public Shared Function Intern (str As String) As String
public: static System::String ^ Intern(System::String ^ str);

param.name: str
param.span: 要在暂存池中搜索的字符串。

span.span: A string to search for in the intern pool.

summary.span: 检索系统对指定 的引用。

span.span: Retrieves the system's reference to the specified .

returns.span: 如果暂存了 ，则返回系统对其的引用；否则返回对值为 的字符串的新引用。

span.span: The system's reference to , if it is interned; otherwise, a new reference to a string with the value of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共语言运行时维护名为暂存池中，包含对每个声明，或在程序中以编程方式创建的唯一字符串的单个引用的表，从而节约字符串存储区。The common language runtime conserves string storage by maintaining a table, called the intern pool, that contains a single reference to each unique literal string declared or created programmatically in your program. 因此，具有特定值的文本字符串的实例仅一次系统中存在。Consequently, an instance of a literal string with a particular value only exists once in the system. 例如，如果将相同的文本字符串分配给几个变量，则运行时检索对文字字符串的相同引用从暂存池中，并将其分配给每个变量。For example, if you assign the same literal string to several variables, the runtime retrieves the same reference to the literal string from the intern pool and assigns it to each variable. 方法使用暂存池中搜索的值相等的字符串`str`。The method uses the intern pool to search for a string equal to the value of `str`. 如果存在这样的字符串，则返回它在暂存池中的引用。If such a string exists, its reference in the intern pool is returned. 如果字符串不存在，对引用`str`添加到暂存池中，则返回该引用。If the string does not exist, a reference to `str` is added to the intern pool, then that reference is returned. 在下面的示例中，具有值为"MyTest"，字符串 s1 已经留用，因为它是在程序中的文本。In the following example, the string s1, which has a value of "MyTest", is already interned because it is a literal in the program. 类生成一个新的字符串对象，具有 s1 相同的值。The class generates a new string object that has the same value as s1. 该字符串的引用分配给 s2。A reference to that string is assigned to s2. 具有相同的值为 s2 的字符串方法搜索。The method searches for a string that has the same value as s2. 由于存在这样的字符串，该方法将返回分配给 s1 中的同一个引用。Because such a string exists, the method returns the same reference that is assigned to s1. 然后，该引用被分配给 s3。That reference is then assigned to s3. 由于它们引用不同的对象; 因此，引用 s1 和 s2 比较不相等引用 s1 和 s3，比较结果相等，这是因为它们引用的相同的字符串。References s1 and s2 compare unequal because they refer to different objects; references s1 and s3 compare equal because they refer to the same string. [!code-csharp[System.String.Intern#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Intern/cs/Intern1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.String.Intern#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Intern/vb/Intern1.vb#1)] 将此方法方法。Compare this method to the method. ## 版本注意事项Version Considerations 在[!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_long](~/includes/net-v35sp1-long-md.md)]、方法恢复到其行为在.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 中的关于暂留空字符串。In the [!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_long](~/includes/net-v35sp1-long-md.md)], the method reverts to its behavior in the .NET Framework 1.0 and 1.1 with regard to interning the empty string. 在下面的示例中，变量`str1`分配到的引用，而变量`str2`分配到的引用返回通过调用方法将转换后的对象，其值是为字符串。In the following example, the variable `str1` is assigned a reference to , and the variable `str2` is assigned the reference to that is returned by calling the method after converting a object whose value is to a string. 然后中包含的参考`str1`和`str2`会比较相等性。Then the references contained in `str1` and `str2` are compared for equality. [!code-csharp[System.String.Intern#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Intern/cs/Intern2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.String.Intern#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Intern/vb/Intern2.vb#2)] 在[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]， [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]，和[!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_short](~/includes/net-v35sp1-short-md.md)]，`str1`和`str2`是否相等。In the [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_short](~/includes/net-v35sp1-short-md.md)], `str1` and `str2` are equal. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v30_long](~/includes/net-v30-long-md.md)]，`str1`和`str2`是否不相等。In the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v30_long](~/includes/net-v30-long-md.md)], `str1` and `str2` are not equal. ## 性能注意事项Performance Considerations 如果你尝试减少的内存总量你的应用程序分配，请记住，暂留字符串还具有两个不需要的负面影响。If you are trying to reduce the total amount of memory your application allocates, keep in mind that interning a string has two unwanted side effects. 首先，内存分配的暂留对象之前，不可能将释放公共语言运行时 (CLR) 终止。First, the memory allocated for interned objects is not likely be released until the common language runtime (CLR) terminates. 原因在于对暂存的 CLR 的引用对象可以保留在你的应用程序或甚至是你的应用程序域后，终止。The reason is that the CLR's reference to the interned object can persist after your application, or even your application domain, terminates. 其次，要留用字符串，必须首先创建字符串。Second, to intern a string, you must first create the string. 使用的内存必须仍然分配对象，即使内存最终将进行垃圾回收。The memory used by the object must still be allocated, even though the memory will eventually be garbage collected. .NET Framework 2.0 版引入了枚举成员。The .NET Framework version 2.0 introduces the enumeration member. 成员标记为不需要字符串暂留的程序集。The member marks an assembly as not requiring string-literal interning. 你可以将应用使用程序集属性。You can apply to an assembly using the attribute. 此外，当使用[Ngen.exe （本机映像生成器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ngen-exe-native-image-generator.md)若要编译的程序集之前运行时，会不暂留字符串多个模块。Also, when you use the [Ngen.exe (Native Image Generator)](~/docs/framework/tools/ngen-exe-native-image-generator.md) to compile an assembly in advance of run time, strings are not interned across modules. ## Examples 下面的示例使用三个字符串相等的值以确定是否可以使用新创建的字符串和留用的字符串相等。The following example uses three strings that are equal in value to determine whether a newly created string and an interned string are equal. [!code-cpp[string.intern#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.intern/CPP/string_intern.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[string.intern#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.intern/CS/string_intern.cs#1)] [!code-vb[string.intern#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.intern/VB/string_intern.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共语言运行时自动维护名为暂存池中，其中包含声明在一个程序，以及任何唯一的实例的每个唯一的文字字符串常量的单个实例的表以编程方式添加通过调用方法。The common language runtime automatically maintains a table, called the intern pool, which contains a single instance of each unique literal string constant declared in a program, as well as any unique instance of you add programmatically by calling the method. 暂存池中，从而节约字符串存储区。The intern pool conserves string storage. 如果将文本字符串常量分配给几个变量，设置每个变量为引用的同一暂存池中，而不是引用的几个不同实例中常数具有相同的值。If you assign a literal string constant to several variables, each variable is set to reference the same constant in the intern pool instead of referencing several different instances of that have identical values. 此方法查找`str`在暂存池中。This method looks up `str` in the intern pool. 如果`str`已经过暂留，则对该实例的引用是返回; 否则为`null`返回。If `str` has already been interned, a reference to that instance is returned; otherwise, `null` is returned. 将此方法方法。Compare this method to the method. 此方法不返回一个布尔值。This method does not return a Boolean value. 如果因为你希望一个布尔值，该值指示是否暂存特定字符串调用方法，你可以使用类似以下的代码。If you call the method because you want a Boolean value that indicates whether a particular string is interned, you can use code such as the following. [!code-csharp[System.String.IsInterned#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.isinterned/cs/isinternedex1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.String.IsInterned#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.isinterned/vb/isinternedex1.vb#1)] > [!NOTE] > 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，你可以重写的暂存池中使用当你使用[Ngen.exe （本机映像生成器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ngen-exe-native-image-generator.md)将程序集安装到本地计算机上的本机映像缓存。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, you can override the use of the intern pool when you use the [Ngen.exe (Native Image Generator)](~/docs/framework/tools/ngen-exe-native-image-generator.md) to install an assembly to the native image cache on a local computer. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注部分中的性能注意事项属性。For more information, see Performance Considerations in the Remarks section for the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示文字字符串自动由编译器留用的过程。The following example demonstrates that literal strings are interned automatically by the compiler. [!code-cpp[string.isinterned#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.isinterned/CPP/isin.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[string.isinterned#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.isinterned/CS/isin.cs#1)] [!code-vb[string.isinterned#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.isinterned/VB/isin.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些 Unicode 字符具有多个等效二进制表示形式包含集组合在一起的和/或复合 Unicode 字符。Some Unicode characters have multiple equivalent binary representations consisting of sets of combining and/or composite Unicode characters. 搜索、 排序、 匹配和其他操作将增加复杂性存在单个字符的多个表示形式。The existence of multiple representations for a single character complicates searching, sorting, matching, and other operations. Unicode 标准定义了一个过程调用返回在给定的任何字符的等效的二进制表示的一种二进制表示形式的规范化。The Unicode standard defines a process called normalization that returns one binary representation when given any of the equivalent binary representations of a character. 可以使用几种算法，称为范式，遵循不同的规则，执行规范化。Normalization can be performed with several algorithms, called normalization forms, that obey different rules. .NET Framework 当前支持 C、 D、 KC 和 KD 的规范化窗体。The .NET Framework currently supports normalization forms C, D, KC, and KD. 有关受支持的 Unicode 范式的说明，请参阅。For a description of supported Unicode normalization forms, see . ## Examples 下面的示例确定一个字符串是否成功规范化为各种范式。The following example determines whether a string is successfully normalized to various normalization forms. [!code-cpp[string.normalize#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.normalize/CPP/norm.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[string.normalize#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.normalize/CS/norm.cs#1)] [!code-vb[string.normalize#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.normalize/VB/norm.vb#1)]

span.span: The method returns as soon as it encounters the first non-normalized character in a string.

para.span: 因此，如果字符串包含无效的 Unicode 字符后, 跟非规范化字符方法会引发尽管返回。

span.span: Therefore, if a string contains non-normalized characters followed by invalid Unicode characters, the method will throw an although returns .

Unicode 标准定义了一个过程调用返回在给定的任何字符的等效的二进制表示的一种二进制表示形式的规范化。The Unicode standard defines a process called normalization that returns one binary representation when given any of the equivalent binary representations of a character. 可以使用几种算法，称为范式，遵循不同的规则，执行规范化。Normalization can be performed with several algorithms, called normalization forms, that obey different rules. .NET Framework 当前支持 C、 D、 KC 和 KD 的规范化窗体。The .NET Framework currently supports normalization forms C, D, KC, and KD. 有关受支持的 Unicode 范式的说明，请参阅。For a description of supported Unicode normalization forms, see . ## Examples 下面的示例演示和方法。The following example demonstrates the and methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一种便利方法，可用于同时测试是否是`null`或其值为。 is a convenience method that enables you to simultaneously test whether a is `null` or its value is . 它等效于以下代码：It is equivalent to the following code: [!code-cpp[System.String.IsNullOrEmpty#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.isnullorempty/cpp/isnullorempty1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.String.IsNullOrEmpty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.isnullorempty/cs/isnullorempty1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.String.IsNullOrEmpty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.isnullorempty/vb/isnullorempty1.vb#1)] 你可以使用方法来测试字符串是否为`null`，其值是，或者它仅由空白字符组成。You can use the method to test whether a string is `null`, its value is , or it consists only of white-space characters. ## 什么是一个 null 字符串？What is a null string? 一个字符串是否为`null`如果它不已分配的值 （以 c + + 和 Visual Basic） 或显式已分配的值`null`。A string is `null` if it has not been assigned a value (in C++ and Visual Basic) or if has explicitly been assigned a value of `null`. 尽管[复合格式设置](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)功能可以正常处理 null 字符串，如以下示例所示，如果其成员引发尝试调用一个。Although the [composite formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md) feature can gracefully handle a null string, as the following example shows, attempting to call one if its members throws a . [!code-cpp[System.String.IsNullOrEmpty#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.isnullorempty/cpp/NullString1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.String.IsNullOrEmpty#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.isnullorempty/cs/NullString1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.String.IsNullOrEmpty#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.isnullorempty/vb/NullString1.vb#2)] ## 空字符串是什么？What is an empty string? 一个字符串为空，如果它显式分配一个空字符串 ("") 或。A string is empty if it is explicitly assigned an empty string ("") or . 空字符串具有为 0。An empty string has a of 0. 下面的示例创建一个空字符串，并显示其值和其长度。The following example creates an empty string and displays its value and its length. [!code-cpp[System.String.IsNullOrEmpty#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.isnullorempty/cpp/NullString1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.String.IsNullOrEmpty#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.isnullorempty/cs/NullString1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.String.IsNullOrEmpty#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.isnullorempty/vb/NullString1.vb#3)] ## Examples 下面的示例检查三个字符串，并确定每个字符串是否具有一个值，为空字符串，或者是否`null`。The following example examines three strings and determines whether each string has a value, is an empty string, or is `null`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引号从零开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 即，位于索引零的字符串中的第一个字符和最后一个位于-1。That is, the first character in the string is at index zero and the last is at - 1. 此方法开始搜索此实例的最后一个字符位置和其后面直到开头`value`找到或已检查完第一个字符位置。This method begins searching at the last character position of this instance and proceeds backward toward the beginning until either `value` is found or the first character position has been examined. 搜索不区分大小写。The search is case-sensitive. 此方法执行序号 （不区分区域性的） 搜索，其中一个字符被视为等效于另一个字符仅当其 Unicode 标量值都是相同。This method performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if their Unicode scalar values are the same. 若要执行区分区域性的搜索，使用方法，其中表示一个复合的字符，例如连字"Æ"(U + 00 C 6) 的 Unicode 标量值可能被视为等效于任何形式的字符中的组件更正序列，如"遍历"(U + 0041、 U + 0045)，则根据区域性。To perform a culture-sensitive search, use the method, where a Unicode scalar value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. ## Examples 下面的示例定义`ExtractFilename`使用方法方法以查找在字符串的最后一个目录分隔符字符并将提取的字符串的文件名。The following example defines an `ExtractFilename` method that uses the method to find the last directory separator character in a string and to extract the string's file name. 如果该文件存在，该方法将返回不包含路径的文件名称。If the file exists, the method returns the file name without its path. remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引号从零开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 即，位于索引零的字符串中的第一个字符和最后一个位于-1。That is, the first character in the string is at index zero and the last is at - 1. 搜索此实例的最后一个字符位置开始和其后面直到开头`value`找到或已检查完第一个字符位置。The search begins at the last character position of this instance and proceeds backward toward the beginning until either `value` is found or the first character position has been examined. 此方法执行使用当前区域性的单词 （区分大小写和区分区域性的） 搜索。This method performs a word (case-sensitive and culture-sensitive) search using the current culture. 字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的比较时该字符不被考虑。Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive comparison. 在区分区域性的搜索中，如果 `value` 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。In a culture-sensitive search, if `value` contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed. 如果`value`仅由一个或多个可忽略字符，组成方法始终返回– 1，表示当前实例中的最后一个索引位置。If `value` consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns – 1, which represents the last index position in the current instance. 在下面的示例中，方法用于在两个字符串中找到三个子字符串 （软连字符 (U + 00AD)、 软连字符后跟"n"和软连字符后跟"m"）。In the following example, the method is used to find three substrings (a soft hyphen (U+00AD), a soft hyphen followed by "n", and a soft hyphen followed by "m") in two strings. 只有一个字符串包含软连字符。Only one of the strings contains a soft hyphen. 如果在上运行该示例[!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)]或更高版本，在每个情况下，因为软连字符是一个可忽略字符，因此结果是相同就像该软连字符不包含在`value`。If the example is run on the [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] or later, in each case, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the result is the same as if the soft hyphen had not been included in `value`. 当搜索时软连字符，该方法将返回 6 和 5。When searching for a soft hyphen only, the method returns 6 and 5. 这些值对应于两个字符串中的最后一个字符的索引。These values correspond to the index of the last character in the two strings. [!code-csharp[System.String.LastIndexOf#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.LastIndexOf/cs/lastindexof21.cs#21)] [!code-vb[System.String.LastIndexOf#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.LastIndexOf/vb/lastindexof21.vb#21)] ## Examples 下面的示例删除开始标记与结束的字符串，如果标记开始和结束位置的字符串的 HTML 标记。The following example removes opening and closing HTML tags from a string if the tags begin and end the string. 如果字符串结尾右括号字符 (">")，该示例使用方法来查找结束标记的开头。If a string ends with a closing bracket character (">"), the example uses the method to locate the start of the end tag. remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引号从零开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 即，位于索引零的字符串中的第一个字符和最后一个位于-1.此方法开始搜索，在`startIndex`字符位置的此实例和沿反向向前直到当前实例的开头`value`找到或已检查完第一个字符位置。That is, the first character in the string is at index zero and the last is at - 1.This method begins searching at the `startIndex` character position of this instance and proceeds backward toward the beginning of the current instance until either `value` is found or the first character position has been examined. 例如，如果`startIndex`是-1，方法搜索到开头的字符串中的最后一个字符从每个字符。For example, if `startIndex` is - 1, the method searches every character from the last character in the string to the beginning. 搜索不区分大小写。The search is case-sensitive. 此方法执行序号 （不区分区域性的） 搜索，其中一个字符被视为等效于另一个字符仅当其 Unicode 标量值都是相同。This method performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if their Unicode scalar values are the same. 若要执行区分区域性的搜索，使用方法，其中表示一个复合的字符，例如连字"Æ"(U + 00 C 6) 的 Unicode 标量值可能被视为等效于任何形式的字符中的组件更正序列，如"遍历"(U + 0041、 U + 0045)，则根据区域性。To perform a culture-sensitive search, use the method, where a Unicode scalar value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. ## Examples 下面的示例查找在字符串中，到字符串的开头使用从字符串的末尾出现的所有字符的索引。The following example finds the index of all occurrences of a character in a string, working from the end of the string to the start of the string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引号从零开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 即，位于索引零的字符串中的第一个字符和最后一个位于-1。That is, the first character in the string is at index zero and the last is at - 1. 在开始执行搜索`startIndex`字符位置的此实例和沿反向直到开头`value`找到或已检查完第一个字符位置。The search begins at the `startIndex` character position of this instance and proceeds backward toward the beginning until either `value` is found or the first character position has been examined. 例如，如果`startIndex`是-1，方法搜索到开头的字符串中的最后一个字符从每个字符。For example, if `startIndex` is - 1, the method searches every character from the last character in the string to the beginning. 此方法执行使用当前区域性的单词 （区分大小写和区分区域性的） 搜索。This method performs a word (case-sensitive and culture-sensitive) search using the current culture. 字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的比较时该字符不被考虑。Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive comparison. 在区分区域性的搜索中，如果 `value` 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。In a culture-sensitive search, if `value` contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed. 如果`value`仅由一个或多个可忽略字符，组成方法始终返回`startIndex`，即开始执行搜索的字符位置。If `value` consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns `startIndex`, which is the character position at which the search begins. 在下面的示例中，方法用于查找子字符串，包含软连字符 (U + 00AD) 并且之前或在字符串中包含的最后一个"m"。In the following example, the method is used to find a substring that includes a soft hyphen (U+00AD) and that precedes or includes the final "m" in a string. 如果在上运行该示例[!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)]或更高版本，因为软连字符后的搜索字符串中将被忽略，调用方法来查找子字符串，包含软连字符和"m"在字符串内，返回"m"的位置而调用此查询以查找 substring，它包含软连字符和"n"返回"n"的位置。If the example is run on the [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] or later, because the soft hyphen in the search string is ignored, calling the method to find a substring that consists of the soft hyphen and "m" returns the position of the "m" in the string, whereas calling it to find a substring that consists of the soft hyphen and "n" returns the position of the "n". 当搜索字符串中包含仅软连字符时，方法会返回"m"，它表示的值的索引`startIndex`。When the search string contains only the soft hyphen, the method returns the index of the "m", which represents the value of `startIndex`. 字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的比较时该字符不被考虑。Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive comparison. 在区分区域性的搜索 (即，如果 不是 或 ) 中，如果 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。In a culture-sensitive search (that is, if is not or ), if contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed. 如果仅由一个或多个可忽略字符，组成方法始终返回– 1，表示当前实例中的最后一个索引位置。If consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns – 1, which represents the last index position in the current instance.
在下面的示例中，方法用于在两个字符串中找到三个子字符串 （软连字符 (U + 00AD)、 软连字符后跟"n"和软连字符后跟"m"）。In the following example, the method is used to find three substrings (a soft hyphen (U+00AD), a soft hyphen followed by "n", and a soft hyphen followed by "m") in two strings. 只有一个字符串包含软连字符。Only one of the strings contains a soft hyphen. 如果在上运行该示例[!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)]或更高版本，因为软连字符是一个可忽略字符，则区分区域性的搜索返回的相同值，它将返回如果软连字符中不包含搜索字符串。If the example is run on the [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] or later, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, a culture-sensitive search returns the same value that it would return if the soft hyphen were not included in the search string. 序号搜索，但是，已成功在一个字符串中查找软连字符，并报告其不存在从第二个字符串。An ordinal search, however, successfully finds the soft hyphen in one string and reports that it is absent from the second string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引号从零开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 即，位于索引零的字符串中的第一个字符和最后一个位于-1。That is, the first character in the string is at index zero and the last is at - 1. 此方法开始搜索，在`startIndex`字符位置和沿反向向前直到此实例的开头`value`找到或`count`检查了字符位置。This method begins searching at the `startIndex` character position and proceeds backward toward the beginning of this instance until either `value` is found or `count` character positions have been examined. 例如，如果`startIndex`是-1，则方法会向后搜索`count`从字符串中的最后一个字符的字符。For example, if `startIndex` is - 1, the method searches backward `count` characters from the last character in the string. 搜索不区分大小写。The search is case-sensitive. 此方法执行序号 （不区分区域性的） 搜索，其中一个字符被视为等效于另一个字符仅当其 Unicode 标量值都是相同。This method performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if their Unicode scalar value are the same. 若要执行区分区域性的搜索，使用方法，其中表示一个复合的字符，例如连字"Æ"(U + 00 C 6) 的 Unicode 标量值可能被视为等效于任何形式的字符中的组件更正序列，如"遍历"(U + 0041、 U + 0045)，则根据区域性。To perform a culture-sensitive search, use the method, where a Unicode scalar value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. ## Examples 下面的示例查找中的子字符串，到的子字符串开始工作所在的子字符串的末尾出现的所有字符的索引。The following example finds the index of all occurrences of a character in a substring, working from the end of the substring to the start of the substring. [!code-cpp[string.lastindexof2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.lastindexof2/CPP/lastixof2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[string.lastindexof2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.lastindexof2/CS/lastixof2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[string.lastindexof2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.lastindexof2/VB/lastixof2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引号从零开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 即，位于索引零的字符串中的第一个字符和最后一个位于-1。That is, the first character in the string is at index zero and the last is at - 1. 在开始执行搜索`startIndex`字符位置的此实例和沿反向直到开头`value`找到或`count`检查了字符位置。The search begins at the `startIndex` character position of this instance and proceeds backward toward the beginning until either `value` is found or `count` character positions have been examined. 例如，如果`startIndex`是-1，则方法会向后搜索`count`从字符串中的最后一个字符的字符。For example, if `startIndex` is - 1, the method searches backward `count` characters from the last character in the string. 此方法执行使用当前区域性的单词 （区分大小写和区分区域性的） 搜索。This method performs a word (case-sensitive and culture-sensitive) search using the current culture. 字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的比较时该字符不被考虑。Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive comparison. 在区分区域性的搜索中，如果 `value` 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。In a culture-sensitive search, if `value` contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed. 如果`value`仅由一个或多个可忽略字符，组成方法始终返回`startIndex`，即开始执行搜索的字符位置。If `value` consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns `startIndex`, which is the character position at which the search begins. 在下面的示例中，方法用于查找在前两个字符串的最后"m"的两个字符的软连字符 (U + 00AD) 的位置。In the following example, the method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) in the two characters that precede the final "m" of two strings. 只有一个字符串包含必需的子字符串。Only one of the strings contains the required substring. 如果在上运行该示例[!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)]或更高版本，在这两种情况下，因为软连字符是一个可忽略字符，该方法返回的字符串中的"m"的索引执行区分区域性的比较时。If the example is run on the [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] or later, in both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison. 注意对于第一个字符串，包含软连字符后跟“m”，该方法无法返回该软连字符的索引，而是返回“m”的索引。Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m". [!code-csharp[System.String.LastIndexOf#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.LastIndexOf/cs/lastindexof23.cs#23)] [!code-vb[System.String.LastIndexOf#23](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.LastIndexOf/vb/lastindexof23.vb#23)] ## Examples 下面的示例查找到的子字符串开头使用从字符串末尾的子字符串中出现的所有字符串的索引。The following example finds the index of all occurrences of a string in substring, working from the end of the substring to the start of the substring. [!code-cpp[string.lastindexof8#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.LastIndexOf8/CPP/lastixof8.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[string.lastindexof8#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.LastIndexOf8/CS/lastixof8.cs#1)] [!code-vb[string.lastindexof8#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.LastIndexOf8/VB/lastixof8.vb#1)]

para.span: 中所述[使用字符串的最佳实践](~/docs/standard/base-types/best-practices-strings.md)，我们建议你避免调用替换为默认值并改为调用需要使用参数来显式指定的方法的字符串比较方法。

span.span: As explained in [Best Practices for Using Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/best-practices-strings.md), we recommend that you avoid calling string comparison methods that substitute default values and instead call methods that require parameters to be explicitly specified.

span.span: To perform this operation by using the comparison rules of the current culture, call the method overload with a value of for its parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引号从零开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 即，位于索引零的字符串中的第一个字符和最后一个位于-1。That is, the first character in the string is at index zero and the last is at - 1. 在开始执行搜索`startIndex`字符位置和沿反向直到`value`找到或已检查完第一个字符位置。The search begins at the `startIndex` character position and proceeds backward until either `value` is found or the first character position has been examined. 例如，如果`startIndex`是-1，方法搜索到开头的字符串中的最后一个字符从每个字符。For example, if `startIndex` is - 1, the method searches every character from the last character in the string to the beginning. `comparisonType`参数指定要搜索`value`参数使用当前或固定区域性、 使用区分大小写或不区分大小写搜索，以及使用 word 或序号比较规则。The `comparisonType` parameter specifies to search for the `value` parameter using the current or invariant culture, using a case-sensitive or case-insensitive search, and using word or ordinal comparison rules. ## Examples 以下 exampledemonstrates 三个重载的查找中使用的不同值的另一个字符串的字符串的最后一个匹配项的方法枚举。The following exampledemonstrates three overloads of the method that find the last occurrence of a string within another string using different values of the enumeration. block.para:
字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的比较时该字符不被考虑。Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive comparison. 在区分区域性的搜索 (即，如果 不是 或 ) 中，如果 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。In a culture-sensitive search (that is, if is not or ), if contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed. 如果仅由一个或多个可忽略字符，组成方法始终返回，即开始执行搜索的字符位置。If consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns , which is the character position at which the search begins.
在下面的示例中，方法用于查找软连字符 (U + 00AD) 后跟"m"，两个字符串中的最后"m"开头的位置。In the following example, the method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m", starting with the final "m" in two strings. 只有一个字符串包含必需的子字符串。Only one of the strings contains the required substring. 如果在上运行该示例[!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)]或更高版本，在这两种情况下，因为软连字符是一个可忽略字符，该方法返回的字符串中的"m"的索引执行区分区域性的比较时。If the example is run on the [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] or later, in both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison. 注意对于第一个字符串，包含软连字符后跟“m”，该方法无法返回该软连字符的索引，而是返回“m”的索引。Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m". 只有当此方法执行序号比较时，它才会在第一个字符串中返回软连字符的索引。The method returns the index of the soft hyphen in the first string only when it performs an ordinal comparison.

block.para:
字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的比较时该字符不被考虑。Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive comparison. 在区分区域性的搜索 (即，如果 不是 或 ) 中，如果 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。In a culture-sensitive search (that is, if is not or ), if contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed. 如果仅由一个或多个可忽略字符，组成方法始终返回，即开始执行搜索的字符位置。If consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns , which is the character position at which the search begins.
在下面的示例中，方法用于在两个字符串中查找跟"m"，在所有软连字符 (U + 00AD) 的位置，但之前的最后"m"的第一个字符位置。In the following example, the method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m" in all but the first character position before the final "m" in two strings. 只有一个字符串包含必需的子字符串。Only one of the strings contains the required substring. 如果在上运行该示例[!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)]或更高版本，在这两种情况下，因为软连字符是一个可忽略字符，该方法返回的字符串中的"m"的索引执行区分区域性的比较时。If the example is run on the [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] or later, in both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison. 当它执行序号比较时，但是，它会查找子字符串仅在第一个字符串中。When it performs an ordinal comparison, however, it finds the substring only in the first string. 请注意，对于第一个字符串，包含软连字符后跟"m"，该方法无法返回该软连字符的索引，但执行区分区域性的比较时，而是返回"m"的索引。Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m" when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison. 只有当此方法执行序号比较时，它才会在第一个字符串中返回软连字符的索引。The method returns the index of the soft hyphen in the first string only when it performs an ordinal comparison.
[!code-csharp[System.String.LastIndexOf#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.LastIndexOf/cs/lastindexof24.cs#24)] [!code-vb[System.String.LastIndexOf#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.LastIndexOf/vb/lastindexof24.vb#24)]

summary.span: 报告在 Unicode 数组中指定的一个或多个字符在此实例中的最后一个匹配项的从零开始的索引的位置。

span.span: Reports the zero-based index position of the last occurrence in this instance of one or more characters specified in a Unicode array.

summary.span: 如果未在此实例中找到数组中的字符，则此方法返回 -1。

span.span: The method returns -1 if the characters in the array are not found in this instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public int LastIndexOfAny (char[] anyOf);
.method public hidebysig instance int32 LastIndexOfAny(char[] anyOf) cil managed
Public Function LastIndexOfAny (anyOf As Char()) As Integer
public: int LastIndexOfAny(cli::array <char> ^ anyOf);

param.name: anyOf
param.span: Unicode 字符数组，包含一个或多个要查找的字符。

span.span: A Unicode character array containing one or more characters to seek.

summary.span: 报告在 Unicode 数组中指定的一个或多个字符在此实例中的最后一个匹配项的从零开始的索引的位置。

span.span: Reports the zero-based index position of the last occurrence in this instance of one or more characters specified in a Unicode array.

returns.span: 最后一次在此实例中找到 中的任意字符的索引位置；如果未找到 中的字符，则为 -1。

span.span: The index position of the last occurrence in this instance where any character in was found; -1 if no character in was found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引号从零开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 此方法开始搜索此实例的最后一个字符位置和其后面直到中的字符开头`anyOf`找到或已检查完第一个字符位置。This method begins searching at the last character position of this instance and proceeds backward toward the beginning until either a character in `anyOf` is found or the first character position has been examined. 搜索不区分大小写。The search is case-sensitive. 此方法执行序号 （不区分区域性的） 搜索，其中一个字符被视为等效于另一个字符仅当其 Unicode 标量值都是相同。This method performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if their Unicode scalar values are the same. 若要执行区分区域性的搜索，使用方法，其中表示一个复合的字符，例如连字"Æ"(U + 00 C 6) 的 Unicode 标量值可能被视为等效于任何形式的字符中的组件更正序列，如"遍历"(U + 0041、 U + 0045)，则根据区域性。To perform a culture-sensitive search, use the method, where a Unicode scalar value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. ## Examples 下面的示例查找的任意字符在字符串中的最后一个匹配项的索引"is"另一个字符串。The following example finds the index of the last occurrence of any character in the string "is" within another string. [!code-cpp[string.lastindexofany1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.LastIndexOfAny1/CPP/lastixany1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[string.lastindexofany1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.LastIndexOfAny1/CS/lastixany1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[string.lastindexofany1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.LastIndexOfAny1/VB/lastixany1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引号从零开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 此方法开始搜索，在`startIndex`字符位置的此实例和沿反向直到中的字符开头`anyOf`找到或已检查完第一个字符位置。This method begins searching at the `startIndex` character position of this instance and proceeds backward toward the beginning until either a character in `anyOf` is found or the first character position has been examined. 搜索不区分大小写。The search is case-sensitive. 此方法执行序号 （不区分区域性的） 搜索，其中一个字符被视为等效于另一个字符仅当其 Unicode 标量值都是相同。This method performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if their Unicode scalar values are the same. 若要执行区分区域性的搜索，使用方法，其中表示一个复合的字符，例如连字"Æ"(U + 00 C 6) 的 Unicode 标量值可能被视为等效于任何形式的字符中的组件更正序列，如"遍历"(U + 0041、 U + 0045)，则根据区域性。To perform a culture-sensitive search, use the method, where a Unicode scalar value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. ## Examples 下面的示例查找的任意字符在字符串中的最后一个匹配项的索引"is"的另一个字符串的子字符串中。The following example finds the index of the last occurrence of any character in the string "is" within a substring of another string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引号从零开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 此方法开始搜索，在`startIndex`字符位置的此实例和沿反向直到中的字符开头`anyOf`找到或`count`检查了字符位置。This method begins searching at the `startIndex` character position of this instance and proceeds backward toward the beginning until either a character in `anyOf` is found or `count` character positions have been examined. 搜索不区分大小写。The search is case-sensitive. 此方法执行序号 （不区分区域性的） 搜索，其中一个字符被视为等效于另一个字符仅当其 Unicode 标量值都是相同。This method performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if their Unicode scalar values are the same. 若要执行区分区域性的搜索，使用方法，其中表示一个复合的字符，例如连字"Æ"(U + 00 C 6) 的 Unicode 标量值可能被视为等效于任何形式的字符中的组件更正序列，如"遍历"(U + 0041、 U + 0045)，则根据区域性。To perform a culture-sensitive search, use the method, where a Unicode scalar value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. ## Examples 下面的示例查找另一个字符串的子字符串中的任意字符在字符串"帮助"中的最后一个匹配项的索引。The following example finds the index of the last occurrence of any character in the string "aid" within a substring of another string. summary.span: 获取当前 对象中的字符数。

span.span: Gets the number of characters in the current object.

value.span: 当前字符串中字符的数量。

span.span: The number of characters in the current string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的数目此实例中的对象，而非 Unicode 字符的数量。The property returns the number of objects in this instance, not the number of Unicode characters. 原因是可能的多个表示 Unicode 字符。The reason is that a Unicode character might be represented by more than one . 使用类以使用每个 Unicode 字符而不是每个。Use the class to work with each Unicode character instead of each . 在某些语言，如 C 和 c + +，null 字符指示一个字符串的末尾。In some languages, such as C and C++, a null character indicates the end of a string. 在.NET Framework 中，可以在字符串中嵌入 null 字符。In the .NET Framework, a null character can be embedded in a string. 当一个字符串包含一个或多个 null 字符时，它们包括在字符串的总长度。When a string includes one or more null characters, they are included in the length of the total string. 例如，在下面的字符串中，"abc"和"def"分隔的 null 字符的子字符串。For example, in the following string, the substrings "abc" and "def" are separated by a null character. 属性返回 7，指示它包括六个字母的字符以及 null 字符。The property returns 7, which indicates that it includes the six alphabetic characters as well as the null character. [!code-cpp[System.String.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Class/cpp/system.string.class.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.String.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Class/cs/System.String.Class.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.String.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Class/vb/System.String.Class.vb#1)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示属性。The following example demonstrates the property. [!code-cpp[string.length#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.length/CPP/length.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[string.length#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.length/CS/length.cs#1)] [!code-vb[string.length#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.length/VB/length.vb#1)]

span.span: Returns a new string whose binary representation is in a particular Unicode normalization form.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Normalize ();
.method public hidebysig instance string Normalize() cil managed
Public Function Normalize () As String
public: System::String ^ Normalize();

summary.span: 返回一个新字符串，其文本值与此字符串相同，但其二进制表示形式符合 Unicode 范式 C。

span.span: Returns a new string whose textual value is the same as this string, but whose binary representation is in Unicode normalization form C.

returns.span: 一个新的规范化字符串，其文本值与此字符串相同，但其二进制表示形式符合范式 C。

span.span: A new, normalized string whose textual value is the same as this string, but whose binary representation is in normalization form C.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些 Unicode 字符具有多个等效二进制表示形式包含集组合在一起的和/或复合 Unicode 字符。Some Unicode characters have multiple equivalent binary representations consisting of sets of combining and/or composite Unicode characters. 例如，下面的代码点的任何可表示字母"ắ":For example, any of the following code points can represent the letter "ắ": - U + 1EAFU+1EAF - U+0103 U+0301U+0103 U+0301 - U+0061 U+0306 U+0301U+0061 U+0306 U+0301 搜索、 排序、 匹配和其他操作将增加复杂性存在单个字符的多个表示形式。The existence of multiple representations for a single character complicates searching, sorting, matching, and other operations. Unicode 标准定义了一个过程调用返回在给定的任何字符的等效的二进制表示的一种二进制表示形式的规范化。The Unicode standard defines a process called normalization that returns one binary representation when given any of the equivalent binary representations of a character. 可以使用几种算法，称为范式，遵循不同的规则，执行规范化。Normalization can be performed with several algorithms, called normalization forms, that obey different rules. .NET Framework 支持四种范式 （C、 D、 KC 和 KD） 定义的 Unicode 标准。当两个字符串以相同的标准化形式表示时，通过使用来比较序号比较。The .NET Framework supports the four normalization forms (C, D, KC, and KD)that are defined by the Unicode standard.When two strings are represented in the same normalization form, theycan be compared by using ordinal comparison. 若要进行规范化，并比较两个字符串，执行以下操作：To normalize and compare two strings, do the following: 1. 获取要从输入源，如文件或单一用户输入的设备进行比较的字符串。Obtain the strings to be compared from an input source, such as a file or a user input device. 2. 调用方法以将字符串规范化为范式 c。Call the method to normalize the strings to normalization form C. 3. 若要比较两个字符串，调用方法，支持的序号字符串比较，如方法，提供的一个值或作为自变量。To compare two strings, call a method that supports ordinal string comparison, such as the method, and supply a value of or as the argument. 若要排序的规范化字符串数组，请将传递`comparer`值或的相应重载。To sort an array of normalized strings, pass a `comparer` value of or to an appropriate overload of . 4. 发出基于上一步所述的顺序排序输出中的字符串。Emit the strings in the sorted output based on the order indicated by the previous step. 有关受支持的 Unicode 范式的说明，请参阅。For a description of supported Unicode normalization forms, see . ## Examples 下面的示例将每个规范化这四种形式的字符串，确认字符串已规范化为指定的范式，则列出规范化字符串中的码位。The following example normalizes a string to each of four normalization forms, confirms the string was normalized to the specified normalization form, then lists the code points in the normalized string. [!code-cpp[string.normalize#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.normalize/CPP/norm.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[string.normalize#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.normalize/CS/norm.cs#1)] [!code-vb[string.normalize#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.normalize/VB/norm.vb#1)]

exception.span: 当前实例包含无效的 Unicode 字符。

span.span: The current instance contains invalid Unicode characters.

para.span: 方法返回只要它遇到第一个非规范化字符串中的字符。

span.span: The method returns as soon as it encounters the first non-normalized character in a string.

para.span: 因此，如果字符串包含无效的 Unicode 字符后, 跟非规范化字符方法会引发尽管返回。

span.span: Therefore, if a string contains non-normalized characters followed by invalid Unicode characters, the method will throw an although returns .

span.span: A new string whose textual value is the same as this string, but whose binary representation is in the normalization form specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些 Unicode 字符具有多个等效二进制表示形式包含集组合在一起的和/或复合 Unicode 字符。Some Unicode characters have multiple equivalent binary representations consisting of sets of combining and/or composite Unicode characters. 搜索、 排序、 匹配和其他操作将增加复杂性存在单个字符的多个表示形式。The existence of multiple representations for a single character complicates searching, sorting, matching, and other operations. Unicode 标准定义了一个过程调用返回在给定的任何字符的等效的二进制表示的一种二进制表示形式的规范化。The Unicode standard defines a process called normalization that returns one binary representation when given any of the equivalent binary representations of a character. 可以使用几种算法，称为范式，遵循不同的规则，执行规范化。Normalization can be performed with several algorithms, called normalization forms, that obey different rules. .NET Framework 支持四种范式 （C、 D、 KC 和 KD） 定义的 Unicode 标准。当两个字符串以相同的标准化形式表示时，它们可以通过使用序号比较进行比较。The .NET Framework supports the four normalization forms (C, D, KC, and KD)that are defined by the Unicode standard.When two strings are represented in the same normalization form, they can be compared by using ordinal comparison. 若要进行规范化，并比较两个字符串，执行以下操作：To normalize and compare two strings, do the following: 1. 获取要从输入源，如文件或单一用户输入的设备进行比较的字符串。Obtain the strings to be compared from an input source, such as a file or a user input device. 2. 调用方法以将字符串规范化为指定的范式。Call the method to normalize the strings to a specified normalization form. 3. 若要比较两个字符串，调用方法，支持的序号字符串比较，如方法，提供的一个值或作为自变量。To compare two strings, call a method that supports ordinal string comparison, such as the method, and supply a value of or as the argument. 若要排序的规范化字符串数组，请将传递`comparer`值或的相应重载。To sort an array of normalized strings, pass a `comparer` value of or to an appropriate overload of . 4. 发出基于上一步所述的顺序排序输出中的字符串。Emit the strings in the sorted output based on the order indicated by the previous step. 有关受支持的 Unicode 范式的说明，请参阅。For a description of supported Unicode normalization forms, see . ## Examples 下面的示例将每个规范化这四种形式的字符串，确认字符串已规范化为指定的范式，则列出规范化字符串中的码位。The following example normalizes a string to each of four normalization forms, confirms the string was normalized to the specified normalization form, then lists the code points in the normalized string. [!code-cpp[string.normalize#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.normalize/CPP/norm.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[string.normalize#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.normalize/CS/norm.cs#1)] [!code-vb[string.normalize#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.normalize/VB/norm.vb#1)]

exception.span: 当前实例包含无效的 Unicode 字符。

span.span: The current instance contains invalid Unicode characters.

para.span: 方法返回只要它遇到第一个非规范化字符串中的字符。

span.span: The method returns as soon as it encounters the first non-normalized character in a string.

para.span: 因此，如果字符串包含无效的 Unicode 字符后, 跟非规范化字符方法可能会引发尽管返回。

span.span: Therefore, if a string contains non-normalized characters followed by invalid Unicode characters, the method may throw an although returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法定义的相等运算符的运算类。The method defines the operation of the equality operator for the class. 这样，如示例部分中所示的代码。It enables code such as that shown in the Example section. 运算符，反过来，调用静态方法，用于执行序号 （区分大小写和不区分区域性） 比较。The operator, in turn, calls the static method, which performs an ordinal (case-sensitive and culture-insensitive) comparison. > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic 编译器不能解决相等运算符与调用方法。The Visual Basic compiler does not resolve the equality operator as a call to the method. 相反，相等运算符包装对的调用方法。Instead, the equality operator wraps a call to the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示相等运算符。The following example demonstrates the equality operator. MemberSignature.Value: public string PadLeft (int totalWidth);
.method public hidebysig instance string PadLeft(int32 totalWidth) cil managed
Public Function PadLeft (totalWidth As Integer) As String
public: System::String ^ PadLeft(int totalWidth);

param.name: totalWidth
param.span: 结果字符串中的字符数，等于原始字符数加上任何其他填充字符。

span.span: The number of characters in the resulting string, equal to the number of original characters plus any additional padding characters.

summary.span: 返回一个新字符串，该字符串通过在此实例中的字符左侧填充空格来达到指定的总长度，从而实现右对齐。

span.span: Returns a new string that right-aligns the characters in this instance by padding them with spaces on the left, for a specified total length.

returns.span: 与此实例等效的一个新字符串，但该字符串为右对齐，因此，在左侧填充所需任意数量的空格，使长度达到 。

span.span: A new string that is equivalent to this instance, but right-aligned and padded on the left with as many spaces as needed to create a length of .

returns.span: 但是，如果 小于此实例的长度，则此方法返回对现有实例的引用。

span.span: However, if is less than the length of this instance, the method returns a reference to the existing instance.

returns.span: 如果 等于此实例的长度，则此方法返回与此实例相同的新字符串。

span.span: If is equal to the length of this instance, the method returns a new string that is identical to this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Unicode 空间被定义为十六进制 0x0020。A Unicode space is defined as hexadecimal 0x0020. 方法来填充返回的字符串的开头。The method pads the beginning of the returned string. 这意味着，当用于右到左的语言，它将填充字符串的右侧部分。This means that, when used with right-to-left languages, it pads the right portion of the string. > [!NOTE] > 如果方法来填充当前实例与空白字符，此方法不会修改当前实例的值。If the method pads the current instance with whitespace characters, this method does not modify the value of the current instance. 相反，它将返回一个新字符串，则用前导空白字符填充，以便其总长度`totalWidth`字符。Instead, it returns a new string that is padded with leading white space so that its total length is `totalWidth` characters. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法。The following example demonstrates the method. [!code-cpp[Classic String.PadLeft Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic String.PadLeft Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic String.PadLeft Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic String.PadLeft Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic String.PadLeft Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic String.PadLeft Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Returns a string array that contains the substrings in this instance that are delimited by elements of a specified string or Unicode character array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于为多个子字符串中断分隔的字符串。 is used to break a delimited string into substrings. 可以使用任一字符数组可指定零行、 一行或多个分隔字符 (方法)，或者可以使用的字符数组来指定零个、 一个或多个分隔字符串。You can use either a character array to specify zero, one, or multiple delimiting characters (the method), or you can use a character array to specify zero, one, or multiple delimiting strings. 重载的方法允许你限制由该方法返回的子字符串的数目 (方法)，以确定是否返回子字符串中包含空字符串 (和方法，或若要实现这两种 (和方法)。Overloads of the method allow you to limit the number of substrings returned by the method (the method), to determine whether empty strings are included in the returned substrings (the and methods, or to do both (the and methods). > [!IMPORTANT] > 有关详细信息上方法，如很好地与调用的示例中，每个重载，请参阅的文档的各个重载。For more detailed information on the method, as well as for examples that call each overload, see the documentation for the individual overloads of . 方法并不总是中断为多个子字符串分隔的字符串的最佳方式。The method is not always the best way to break a delimited string into substrings. 如果你不想要提取所有的子字符串的分隔的字符串，或者如果你想要分析基于模式而不是一组分隔符字符的字符串，请考虑以下替代方法。If you don't want to extract all of the substrings of a delimited string, or if you want to parse a string based on a pattern instead of a set of delimiter characters, consider the following alternatives. ## 正则表达式Regular expressions 如果您的字符串符合的固定模式，可以使用正则表达式提取和处理它们的元素。If your strings conform to a fixed pattern, you can use a regular expression to extract and handle their elements. 例如，如果字符串采用以下形式"*数**操作数**数*"可以使用[正则表达式](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md)提取和处理字符串的元素。For example, if strings take the form "*number* *operand* *number*" you can use a [regular expression](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md) to extract and handle the string's elements. 以下是一个示例：Here's an example: [!code-csharp[System.String.Split#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/cs/splitalt1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.String.Split#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/vb/splitalt1.vb#8)] 正则表达式模式`(\d+)\s+([-+*/])\s+(\d+)`定义如下：The regular expression pattern `(\d+)\s+([-+*/])\s+(\d+)` is defined like this: |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`(\d+)`|匹配一个或多个十进制数字。Match one or more decimal digits. 这是第一个捕获组。This is the first capturing group.| |`\s+`|匹配一个或多个空格字符。Match one or more whitespace characters.| |`([-+*/])`|匹配一个算术运算符符号 (+、-，\*，或 /)。Match an arithmetic operator sign (+, -, \*, or /). 这是第二个捕获组。This is the second capturing group.| |`\s+`|匹配一个或多个空格字符。Match one or more whitespace characters.| |`(\d+)`|匹配一个或多个十进制数字。Match one or more decimal digits. 这是第三个捕获组。This is the third capturing group.| 正则表达式还可用于从基于一种模式，而不是一组固定的字符的字符串提取子字符串。You can also use a regular expression to extract substrings from a string based on a pattern rather than a fixed set of characters. 这些条件之一发生时，这是一种常见方案：This is a common scenario when either of these conditions occurs: - 一个或多个分隔符字符不始终用作分隔符中实例。One or more of the delimiter characters does not always serve as a delimiter in the instance. - 序列和分隔符字符的数量是变量或未知。The sequence and number of delimiter characters is variable or unknown. 例如，方法无法用于拆分以下字符串，因为数`\n`（在 C# 中) 或`vbCrLf`（在 Visual Basic) 字符是变量，并且始终不用作分隔符。For example, the method cannot be used to split the following string, because the number of `\n` (in C#) or `vbCrLf` (in Visual Basic) characters is variable, and they don't always serve as delimiters. ``` [This is captured\ntext.]\n\n[\n[This is more captured text.]\n] \n[Some more captured text:\n Option1\n Option2][Terse text.] ``` 正则表达式可以轻松地，如以下示例所示拆分此字符串。A regular expression can split this string easily, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.String.Split#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/cs/splitalt2.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.String.Split#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/vb/splitalt2.vb#9)] 正则表达式模式`\[([^\[\]]+)\]`定义如下：The regular expression pattern `\[([^\[\]]+)\]` is defined like this: |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`\[`|匹配左括号。Match an opening bracket.| |`([^\[\]]+)`|匹配任何字符都不大括号或右括号一个或多个时间。Match any character that is not an opening or a closing bracket one or more times. 这是第一个捕获组。This is the first capturing group.| |`\]`|匹配右括号。Match a closing bracket.| 方法是几乎与，只不过它将拆分基于正则表达式模式而不是固定的字符集的字符串。The method is almost identical to , except that it splits a string based on a regular expression pattern instead of a fixed character set. 例如，下面的示例使用方法包含由连字符和其他字符的各种组合分隔的子字符串将字符串拆分。For example, the following example uses the method to split a string that contains substrings delimited by various combinations of hyphens and other characters. [!code-csharp[System.String.Split#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/cs/splitalt3.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.String.Split#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/vb/splitalt3.vb#10)] 正则表达式模式`\s-\s?[+*]?\s?-\s`定义如下：The regular expression pattern `\s-\s?[+*]?\s?-\s` is defined like this: |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`\s-`|匹配连字符后跟一个空白字符。Match a whitespace character followed by a hyphen.| |`\s?`|匹配零个或一个空白字符。Match zero or one whitespace character.| |`[+*]?`|匹配零个或一个匹配项的 + 或 \* 字符。Match zero or one occurrence of either the + or \* character.| |`\s?`|匹配零个或一个空白字符。Match zero or one whitespace character.| |`-\s`|匹配连字符后跟空白字符。Match a hyphen followed by a whitespace character.| ## 搜索方法和 Substring 方法Search methods and the Substring method 如果你不感兴趣所有字符串中子字符串，你可能希望使用一个返回匹配的开始的索引的字符串比较方法。If you aren't interested in all of the substrings in a string, you might prefer to work with one of the string comparison methods that returns the index at which the match begins. 然后，你可以调用方法以提取所需的子字符串。You can then call the method to extract the substring that you want. 字符串比较方法包括：The string comparison methods include: - 它返回的字符串实例的字符或字符串的第一个匹配项的从零开始索引。, which returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of a character or string in a string instance. - 它返回的字符数组中的任意字符的第一个匹配项的当前的字符串实例中的从零开始的索引。, which returns the zero-based index in the current string instance of the first occurrence of any character in a character array. - 它返回的字符串实例的字符或字符串的最后一个匹配项的从零开始索引。, which returns the zero-based index of the last occurrence of a character or string in a string instance. - 它返回的字符数组中的任意字符的最后一个匹配项的当前的字符串实例中的从零开始的索引。, which returns a zero-based index in the current string instance of the last occurrence of any character in a character array. 下面的示例使用方法以查找在字符串的时间段。The following example uses the method to find the periods in a string. 然后，它使用方法以返回完整的句子。It then uses the method to return full sentences. [!code-csharp[System.String.Split#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/cs/splitalt4.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.String.Split#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/vb/splitalt4.vb#11)]
