remarks.format:
## Remarks 当字符串分隔的一组已知的字符时，你可以使用方法将其单独放入子字符串。When a string is delimited by a known set of characters, you can use the method to separate it into substrings. 从字符串提取子字符串的其他方法，请参阅[String.Split 的替代方法](#Alternatives)部分。For other ways to extract substrings from a string, see the [Alternatives to String.Split](#Alternatives) section. ## 返回值的详细信息Return value details 返回的数组的元素中不包含分隔符字符。Delimiter characters are not included in the elements of the returned array. 例如，如果分隔符数组包含字符"-"和当前的字符串实例的值是"aa bb cc"，该方法返回一个数组，包含三个元素:"aa"、"bb"和"抄送"。For example, if the separator array includes the character "-" and the value of the current string instance is "aa-bb-cc", the method returns an array that contains three elements: "aa", "bb", and "cc". 如果此实例不包含任何中的字符`separator`，返回的数组包含一个包含此实例的单个元素。If this instance does not contain any of the characters in `separator`, the returned array consists of a single element that contains this instance. 每个元素`separator`定义单独的分隔符字符。Each element of `separator` defines a separate delimiter character. 如果两个分隔符相邻，或者开头或的此实例的末尾找到分隔符，则返回的数组中的相应元素包含。If two delimiters are adjacent, or a delimiter is found at the beginning or end of this instance, the corresponding element in the returned array contains . 下面是一些可能的恶意活动：Here are some examples: |字符串值String value|SeparatorSeparator|返回的数组Returned array| |------------------|---------------|--------------------| |"42, 12, 19""42, 12, 19"|新 Char [] {'，'，' '} (C#)new Char[] {',', ' '} (C#)

Char() = {","c, " "c}) (Visual Basic)Char() = {","c, " "c}) (Visual Basic)|{"42", "", "12", "", "19"}{"42", "", "12", "", "19"}| |"42..12..19""42..12..19"|新 Char [] {'。 '}new Char[] {'.'} (C#)(C#)

Char （) = {"。"c} (Visual Basic)Char() = {"."c} (Visual Basic)|{"42", "", "12", "", "19"}{"42", "", "12", "", "19"}| |"香蕉""Banana"|新 Char [] {'。 '}new Char[] {'.'} (C#)(C#)

Char （) = {"。"c} (Visual Basic)Char() = {"."c} (Visual Basic)|{"Banana"}{"Banana"}| |"Darb\nSmarba" (C#)"Darb\nSmarba" (C#)

"Darb" & vbLf & "Smarba" (Visual Basic)"Darb" & vbLf & "Smarba" (Visual Basic)|新 Char [] {} (C#)new Char[] {} (C#)

Char （) = {} (Visual Basic)Char() = {} (Visual Basic)|{"Darb", "Smarba"}{"Darb", "Smarba"}| |"Darb\nSmarba" (C#)"Darb\nSmarba" (C#)

"Darb" & vbLf & "Smarba" (Visual Basic)"Darb" & vbLf & "Smarba" (Visual Basic)|null (C#)null (C#)

Nothing (Visual Basic)Nothing (Visual Basic)|{"Darb", "Smarba"}{"Darb", "Smarba"}| ## 分隔符数组The separator array 分隔符的每个元素定义包含单个字符的单独分隔符。Each element of separator defines a separate delimiter that consists of a single character. 如果`separator`自变量是`null`或不包含任何字符，该方法将空格视为分隔符。If the `separator` argument is `null` or contains no characters, the method treats white-space characters as the delimiters. 由 Unicode 标准; 定义空白字符它们返回`true`如果它们传递给方法。White-space characters are defined by the Unicode standard; they return `true` if they are passed to the method. ## String.Split(Char[]) 和编译器重载决策String.Split(Char[]) and compiler overload resolution 尽管的此重载的单个参数为字符数组，你可以调用它与单个字符，如以下示例所示。Although the single parameter for this overload of is a character array, you can call it with a single character, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.String.Split#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/cs/Split_CompilerResolution1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.String.Split#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/vb/Split_CompilerResolution1.vb#12)] 因为`separator`参数用修饰属性，编译器将解释单个字符作为单个元素字符数组。Because the `separator` parameter is decorated with the attribute, compilers will interpret a single character as a single-element character array. 这不是其他用例重载，以包括`separator`参数，则必须显式传递这些重载为字符数组`separator`自变量。This is not the case for other overloads that include a `separator` parameter; you must explicitly pass these overloads a character array as the `separator` argument. ## 比较详细信息Comparison details 方法提取由一个或多个中的字符分隔此字符串中子字符串`separator`数组中，然后将这些子字符串作为数组的元素返回。The method extracts the substrings in this string that are delimited by one or more of the characters in the `separator` array, and returns those substrings as elements of an array. 方法执行使用区分大小写的序号排序规则的比较，从而查找分隔符。The method looks for delimiters by performing comparisons using case-sensitive ordinal sort rules. 有关 word、 字符串和顺序排序的详细信息，请参阅枚举。For more information about word, string, and ordinal sorts, see the enumeration. ## String.Split 的替代方法Alternatives to String.Split 方法并不总是中断为多个子字符串分隔的字符串的最佳方式。The method is not always the best way to break a delimited string into substrings. 如果你不想要提取所有的子字符串的分隔的字符串，或者如果你想要分析基于模式而不是一组分隔符字符的字符串，请考虑以下替代方法。If you don't want to extract all of the substrings of a delimited string, or if you want to parse a string based on a pattern instead of a set of delimiter characters, consider the following alternatives. ### 正则表达式Regular expressions 如果您的字符串符合的固定模式，可以使用正则表达式提取和处理它们的元素。If your strings conform to a fixed pattern, you can use a regular expression to extract and handle their elements. 例如，如果字符串采用以下形式"*数**操作数**数*"可以使用[正则表达式](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md)提取和处理字符串的元素。For example, if strings take the form "*number* *operand* *number*" you can use a [regular expression](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md) to extract and handle the string's elements. 以下是一个示例：Here's an example: [!code-csharp[System.String.Split#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/cs/splitalt1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.String.Split#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/vb/splitalt1.vb#8)] 正则表达式模式`(\d+)\s+([-+*/])\s+(\d+)`定义如下：The regular expression pattern `(\d+)\s+([-+*/])\s+(\d+)` is defined like this: |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`(\d+)`|匹配一个或多个十进制数字。Match one or more decimal digits. 这是第一个捕获组。This is the first capturing group.| |`\s+`|匹配一个或多个空格字符。Match one or more whitespace characters.| |`([-+*/])`|匹配一个算术运算符符号 (+、-，\*，或 /)。Match an arithmetic operator sign (+, -, \*, or /). 这是第二个捕获组。This is the second capturing group.| |`\s+`|匹配一个或多个空格字符。Match one or more whitespace characters.| |`(\d+)`|匹配一个或多个十进制数字。Match one or more decimal digits. 这是第三个捕获组。This is the third capturing group.| 正则表达式还可用于从基于一种模式，而不是一组固定的字符的字符串提取子字符串。You can also use a regular expression to extract substrings from a string based on a pattern rather than a fixed set of characters. 这些条件之一发生时，这是一种常见方案：This is a common scenario when either of these conditions occurs: - 一个或多个分隔符字符不始终用作分隔符中实例。One or more of the delimiter characters does not always serve as a delimiter in the instance. - 序列和分隔符字符的数量是变量或未知。The sequence and number of delimiter characters is variable or unknown. 例如，方法无法用于拆分以下字符串，因为数`\n`（在 C# 中) 或`vbCrLf`（在 Visual Basic) 字符是变量，并且始终不用作分隔符。For example, the method cannot be used to split the following string, because the number of `\n` (in C#) or `vbCrLf` (in Visual Basic) characters is variable, and they don't always serve as delimiters. ``` [This is captured\ntext.]\n\n[\n[This is more captured text.]\n] \n[Some more captured text:\n Option1\n Option2][Terse text.] ``` 正则表达式可以轻松地，如以下示例所示拆分此字符串。A regular expression can split this string easily, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.String.Split#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/cs/splitalt2.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.String.Split#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/vb/splitalt2.vb#9)] 正则表达式模式`\[([^\[\]]+)\]`定义如下：The regular expression pattern `\[([^\[\]]+)\]` is defined like this: |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`\[`|匹配左括号。Match an opening bracket.| |`([^\[\]]+)`|匹配任何字符都不大括号或右括号一个或多个时间。Match any character that is not an opening or a closing bracket one or more times. 这是第一个捕获组。This is the first capturing group.| |`\]`|匹配右括号。Match a closing bracket.| 方法是几乎与，只不过它将拆分基于正则表达式模式而不是固定的字符集的字符串。The method is almost identical to , except that it splits a string based on a regular expression pattern instead of a fixed character set. 例如，下面的示例使用方法包含由连字符和其他字符的各种组合分隔的子字符串将字符串拆分。For example, the following example uses the method to split a string that contains substrings delimited by various combinations of hyphens and other characters. [!code-csharp[System.String.Split#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/cs/splitalt3.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.String.Split#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/vb/splitalt3.vb#10)] 正则表达式模式`\s-\s?[+*]?\s?-\s`定义如下：The regular expression pattern `\s-\s?[+*]?\s?-\s` is defined like this: |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`\s-`|匹配连字符后跟一个空白字符。Match a whitespace character followed by a hyphen.| |`\s?`|匹配零个或一个空白字符。Match zero or one whitespace character.| |`[+*]?`|匹配零个或一个匹配项的 + 或 \* 字符。Match zero or one occurrence of either the + or \* character.| |`\s?`|匹配零个或一个空白字符。Match zero or one whitespace character.| |`-\s`|匹配连字符后跟空白字符。Match a hyphen followed by a whitespace character.| ### 搜索方法和 Substring 方法Search methods and the Substring method 如果你不感兴趣所有字符串中子字符串，你可能希望使用一个返回匹配的开始的索引的字符串比较方法。If you aren't interested in all of the substrings in a string, you might prefer to work with one of the string comparison methods that returns the index at which the match begins. 然后，你可以调用方法以提取所需的子字符串。You can then call the method to extract the substring that you want. 字符串比较方法包括：The string comparison methods include: - 它返回的字符串实例的字符或字符串的第一个匹配项的从零开始索引。, which returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of a character or string in a string instance. - 它返回的字符数组中的任意字符的第一个匹配项的当前的字符串实例中的从零开始的索引。, which returns the zero-based index in the current string instance of the first occurrence of any character in a character array. - 它返回的字符串实例的字符或字符串的最后一个匹配项的从零开始索引。, which returns the zero-based index of the last occurrence of a character or string in a string instance. - 它返回的字符数组中的任意字符的最后一个匹配项的当前的字符串实例中的从零开始的索引。, which returns a zero-based index in the current string instance of the last occurrence of any character in a character array. 下面的示例使用方法以查找在字符串的时间段。The following example uses the method to find the periods in a string. 然后，它使用方法以返回完整的句子。It then uses the method to return full sentences. [!code-csharp[System.String.Split#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/cs/splitalt4.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.String.Split#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/vb/splitalt4.vb#11)] ## 性能注意事项Performance Considerations 方法返回的数组对象分配内存和每个数组元素的对象。The methods allocate memory for the returned array object and a object for each array element. 如果你的应用程序需要最佳性能，或你的应用程序管理内存分配至关重要，请考虑使用或方法。If your application requires optimal performance or if managing memory allocation is critical in your application, consider using the or method. 你还可以选择使用方法来查找字符串中的子字符串。You also have the option of using the method to locate a substring within a string. 若要在分隔符字符将字符串拆分，使用或方法来查找字符串中的分隔符。To split a string at a separator character, use the or method to locate a separator character in the string. 若要在分隔符字符串将字符串拆分，使用或方法来查找分隔符字符串的第一个字符。To split a string at a separator string, use the or method to locate the first character of the separator string. 然后使用方法来确定该第一个字符后面的字符是否为等于其余的字符的分隔符字符串。Then use the method to determine whether the characters after that first character are equal to the remaining characters of the separator string. 此外，如果组相同的字符用于拆分中存在多个字符串方法调用，请考虑创建一个数组，并在每个方法调用中引用它。In addition, if the same set of characters is used to split strings in multiple method calls, consider creating a single array and referencing it in each method call. 从而大幅减少每个方法调用的其他系统开销。This significantly reduces the additional overhead of each method call. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何通过将视为分隔符的空格和标点符号的文本块从提取各个单词。The following example demonstrates how to extract individual words from a block of text by treating white space and punctuation marks as delimiters. 字符数组传递给`separator`参数方法组成一个空格字符和一个 tab 字符，以及一些常用标点符号。The character array passed to the `separator` parameter of the method consists of a space character and a tab character, together with some common punctuation symbols. [!code-csharp[System.String.Split#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/cs/split2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.String.Split#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/vb/split2.vb#2)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks 返回的数组的元素中不包含分隔符字符。Delimiter characters are not included in the elements of the returned array. 如果此实例不包含任何中的字符`separator`，返回的数组包含一个包含此实例的单个元素。If this instance does not contain any of the characters in `separator`, the returned array consists of a single element that contains this instance. 如果`count`为零，则返回一个空数组。If `count` is zero, an empty array is returned. 如果`separator`参数是`null`或不包含任何字符，空白字符都被认为是分隔符。If the `separator` parameter is `null` or contains no characters, white-space characters are assumed to be the delimiters. 由 Unicode 标准和返回定义空白字符`true`如果它们传递给方法。White-space characters are defined by the Unicode standard and return `true` if they are passed to the method. 每个元素`separator`定义单独的分隔符字符。Each element of `separator` defines a separate delimiter character. 如果两个分隔符相邻，或者开头或的此实例的末尾找到分隔符，则相应的数组元素包含。If two delimiters are adjacent, or a delimiter is found at the beginning or end of this instance, the corresponding array element contains . 如果有多个`count`个子字符串在此情况下，第一个`count`减去 1 的子字符串将返回在第一个`count`减 1 个元素的返回值，且其余的字符在此实例中返回的最后一个返回值的元素。If there are more than `count` substrings in this instance, the first `count` minus 1 substrings are returned in the first `count` minus 1 elements of the return value, and the remaining characters in this instance are returned in the last element of the return value. 如果`count`大于数量的子字符串，则返回可用的子字符串和不引发异常。If `count` is greater than the number of substrings, the available substrings are returned and no exception is thrown. 下表提供了示例。The following table provides examples. |字符串值String value|SeparatorSeparator|计数Count|返回的数组Returned array| |------------------|---------------|-----------|--------------------| |"42, 12, 19""42, 12, 19"|新 Char [] {'，'，' '} (C#)new Char[] {',', ' '} (C#)

Char() = {","c, " "c} (Visual Basic)Char() = {","c, " "c} (Visual Basic)|22|{"42", " 12, 19"}{"42", " 12, 19"}| |"42..12..19""42..12..19"|新 Char [] {'。 '}new Char[] {'.'} (C#)(C#)

Char （) = {"。"c} (Visual Basic)Char() = {"."c} (Visual Basic)|44|{"42", "", "12", ".19"}{"42", "", "12", ".19"}| |"香蕉""Banana"|新 Char [] {'。 '}new Char[] {'.'} (C#)(C#)

Char （) = {"。"c} (Visual Basic)Char() = {"."c} (Visual Basic)|22|{"Banana"}{"Banana"}| |"Darb\nSmarba" (C#)"Darb\nSmarba" (C#)

"Darb" & vbLf & "Smarba" (Visual Basic)"Darb" & vbLf & "Smarba" (Visual Basic)|新 Char [] {} (C#)new Char[] {} (C#)

Char （) = {} (Visual Basic)Char() = {} (Visual Basic)|11|{"Darb\nSmarba"} (C#){"Darb\nSmarba"} (C#)

"Darb" & vbLf & "Smarba" (Visual Basic)"Darb" & vbLf & "Smarba" (Visual Basic)| |"Darb\nSmarba" (C#)"Darb\nSmarba" (C#)

"Darb" & vbLf & "Smarba" (Visual Basic)"Darb" & vbLf & "Smarba" (Visual Basic)|新的 Char [] null (C#)new Char[] null (C#)

Char （) = NothingChar() = Nothing|22|{"Darb", "Smarba"}{"Darb", "Smarba"}| |"Darb\nSmarba" (C#)"Darb\nSmarba" (C#)

"Darb" & vbLf & "Smarba" (Visual Basic)"Darb" & vbLf & "Smarba" (Visual Basic)|新的 Char [] null (C#)new Char[] null (C#)

Char （) = NothingChar() = Nothing|100100|{"Darb", "Smarba"}{"Darb", "Smarba"}| ## 性能注意事项Performance Considerations 方法返回的数组对象分配内存和每个数组元素的对象。The methods allocate memory for the returned array object and a object for each array element. 如果你的应用程序需要最佳性能，或你的应用程序管理内存分配至关重要，请考虑使用或方法，并选择性地方法，来查找字符串中的子字符串。If your application requires optimal performance or if managing memory allocation is critical in your application, consider using the or method, and optionally the method, to locate a substring within a string. 如果你拆分的字符串中的分隔符，使用或方法来查找字符串中的分隔符。If you are splitting a string at a separator character, use the or method to locate a separator character in the string. 如果你拆分的字符串中的分隔符字符串，使用或方法来查找分隔符字符串的第一个字符。If you are splitting a string at a separator string, use the or method to locate the first character of the separator string. 然后使用方法来确定该第一个字符后面的字符是否为等于其余的字符的分隔符字符串。Then use the method to determine whether the characters after that first character are equal to the remaining characters of the separator string. 此外，如果组相同的字符用于拆分中存在多个字符串方法调用，请考虑创建一个数组，并在每个方法调用中引用它。In addition, if the same set of characters is used to split strings in multiple method calls, consider creating a single array and referencing it in each method call. 从而大幅减少每个方法调用的其他系统开销。This significantly reduces the additional overhead of each method call. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何`count`会影响返回的字符串的数量。The following example demonstrates how `count` affects the number of strings returned by . [!code-csharp[StringSplit2#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StringSplit2/CS/StringSplit10.cs#10)] [!code-vb[StringSplit2#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StringSplit2/VB/stringsplit10.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 返回值的详细信息Return value details 分隔符字符 (中的字符`separator`数组) 不包括在返回数组的元素。Delimiter characters (the characters in the `separator` array) are not included in the elements of the returned array. 例如，如果`separator`数组包含字符"-"和当前的字符串实例的值是"aa bb cc"，该方法返回一个数组，包含三个元素:"aa"、"bb"和"抄送"。For example, if the `separator` array includes the character "-" and the value of the current string instance is "aa-bb-cc", the method returns an array that contains three elements: "aa", "bb", and "cc". 如果此实例不包含任何中的字符`separator`，返回的数组包含一个包含此实例的单个元素。If this instance does not contain any of the characters in `separator`, the returned array consists of a single element that contains this instance. 如果`options`参数是和此实例的长度为零，该方法返回空数组。If the `options` parameter is and the length of this instance is zero, the method returns an empty array. 每个元素`separator`定义包含单个字符的单独分隔符。Each element of `separator` defines a separate delimiter that consists of a single character. 如果`options`自变量是，和两个分隔符是相邻或分隔符找到的开头或末尾此情况下，相应的数组元素都包含。If the `options` argument is , and two delimiters are adjacent or a delimiter is found at the beginning or end of this instance, the corresponding array element contains . 例如，如果`separator`包括两个元素，"-"和"\_"，字符串实例的值是"-\_aa-\_"，和的值`options`自变量是，该方法返回的字符串数组下面的五个元素：For example, if `separator` includes two elements, "-" and "\_", the value of the string instance is "-\_aa-\_", and the value of the `options` argument is , the method returns a string array with the following five elements: 1. 表示之前的空字符串"-"字符位于索引 0 处。, which represents the empty string that precedes the "-" character at index 0. 2. 它表示之间的空字符串"-"字符在索引 0 和位于索引 1 处的"_"字符。, which represents the empty string between the "-" character at index 0 and the "_" character at index 1. 3. "aa"，"aa", 4. 它表示后面索引 4 处的"_"字符的空字符串。, which represents the empty string that follows the "_" character at index 4. 5. 它表示后面的空字符串"-"字符索引 5 处。, which represents the empty string that follows the "-" character at index 5. ## 分隔符数组The separator array 如果`separator`参数是`null`或不包含任何字符，空白字符都被认为是分隔符。If the `separator` parameter is `null` or contains no characters, white-space characters are assumed to be the delimiters. 由 Unicode 标准和返回定义空白字符`true`如果它们传递给方法。White-space characters are defined by the Unicode standard and return `true` if they are passed to the method. 如果`separator`对此方法重载的调用中的参数是`null`，编译器重载决策失败。If the `separator` parameter in the call to this method overload is `null`, compiler overload resolution fails. 若要明确地标识所调用的方法，你的代码必须指示的一种`null`。To unambiguously identify the called method, your code must indicate the type of the `null`. 下面的示例演示通过多种方式来明确地标识此重载。The following example shows several ways to unambiguously identify this overload. [!code-csharp[System.String.Split#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/cs/split3.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.String.Split#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/vb/split3.vb#5)] ## 比较详细信息Comparison details 方法提取由一个或多个中的字符分隔此字符串中子字符串`separator`参数，并将这些子字符串作为数组的元素返回。The method extracts the substrings in this string that are delimited by one or more of the characters in the `separator` parameter, and returns those substrings as elements of an array. 方法执行使用区分大小写的序号排序规则的比较，从而查找分隔符。The method looks for delimiters by performing comparisons using case-sensitive ordinal sort rules. 有关 word、 字符串和顺序排序的详细信息，请参阅枚举。For more information about word, string, and ordinal sorts, see the enumeration. ## 性能注意事项Performance Considerations 方法返回的数组对象分配内存和每个数组元素的对象。The methods allocate memory for the returned array object and a object for each array element. 如果你的应用程序需要最佳性能，或你的应用程序管理内存分配至关重要，请考虑使用或方法，并选择性地方法，来查找字符串中的子字符串。If your application requires optimal performance or if managing memory allocation is critical in your application, consider using the or method, and optionally the method, to locate a substring within a string. 如果你拆分的字符串中的分隔符，使用或方法来查找字符串中的分隔符。If you are splitting a string at a separator character, use the or method to locate a separator character in the string. 如果你拆分的字符串中的分隔符字符串，使用或方法来查找分隔符字符串的第一个字符。If you are splitting a string at a separator string, use the or method to locate the first character of the separator string. 然后使用方法来确定该第一个字符后面的字符是否为等于其余的字符的分隔符字符串。Then use the method to determine whether the characters after that first character are equal to the remaining characters of the separator string. 此外，如果组相同的字符用于拆分中存在多个字符串方法调用，请考虑创建一个数组，并在每个方法调用中引用它。In addition, if the same set of characters is used to split strings in multiple method calls, consider creating a single array and referencing it in each method call. 从而大幅减少每个方法调用的其他系统开销。This significantly reduces the additional overhead of each method call. ## Examples 下面的示例使用枚举，以包括或排除子字符串由生成方法。The following example uses the enumeration to include or exclude substrings generated by the method. [!code-cpp[string.split3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.split3/CPP/omit.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[string.split3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.split3/CS/omit.cs#1)] [!code-vb[string.split3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.split3/VB/omit.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当字符串分隔的一组已知的字符串时，你可以使用方法将其单独放入子字符串。When a string is delimited by a known set of strings, you can use the method to separate it into substrings. ## 返回值的详细信息Return value details 返回的数组的元素中不包括分隔符字符串。Delimiter strings are not included in the elements of the returned array. 例如，如果`separator`数组包含字符串"-"和当前的字符串实例的值是"aa-bb 抄送"，该方法返回一个数组，包含三个元素:"aa"、"bb"和"抄送"。For example, if the `separator` array includes the string "--" and the value of the current string instance is "aa--bb-cc", the method returns an array that contains three elements: "aa", "bb", and "cc". 如果此实例不包含任何中的字符串`separator`，返回的数组包含一个包含此实例的单个元素。If this instance does not contain any of the strings in `separator`, the returned array consists of a single element that contains this instance. 如果`options`参数是和此实例的长度为零，该方法返回空数组。If the `options` parameter is and the length of this instance is zero, the method returns an empty array. 每个元素`separator`定义一个或多个字符组成的单独分隔符。Each element of `separator` defines a separate delimiter that consists of one or more characters. 如果`options`自变量是，和两个分隔符是相邻或分隔符找到的开头或末尾此情况下，相应的数组元素都包含。If the `options` argument is , and two delimiters are adjacent or a delimiter is found at the beginning or end of this instance, the corresponding array element contains . 例如，如果`separator`包括两个元素，"-"和"_"、 字符串实例的值是"-_aa-\_"，和的值`options`自变量是，该方法返回以下五个元素的字符串数组：For example, if `separator` includes two elements, "-" and "_", the value of the string instance is "-_aa-\_", and the value of the `options` argument is , the method returns a sting array with the following five elements: 1. 表示之前的空字符串"-"位于索引 0 处的子字符串。, which represents the empty string that precedes the "-" substring at index 0. 2. 它表示之间的空字符串"-"在索引 0 和位于索引 1 处的"_"子字符串的子字符串。, which represents the empty string between the "-" substring at index 0 and the "_" substring at index 1. 3. "aa"，"aa", 4. 它表示后面索引 4 处的"_"子字符串的空字符串。, which represents the empty string that follows the "_" substring at index 4. 5. 它表示后面的空字符串"-"索引 5 处的子字符串。, which represents the empty string that follows the "-" substring at index 5. ## 分隔符数组The separator array 如果任何中的元素`separator`包含的多个字符，将整个子字符串被视为分隔符。If any of the elements in `separator` consists of multiple characters, the entire substring is considered a delimiter. 例如，如果一个中的元素的`separator`为"10"，以尝试拆分字符串"This10is10a10string。"For example, if one of the elements in `separator` is "10", attempting to split the string "This10is10a10string." 返回以下四个元素的数组: {"This"，"is"，"a"、"字符串。returns the following four-element array: { "This", "is", "a", "string." }.}. 如果`separator`参数是`null`或不包含任何字符，空白字符都被认为是分隔符。If the `separator` parameter is `null` or contains no characters, white-space characters are assumed to be the delimiters. 由 Unicode 标准和返回定义空白字符`true`如果它们传递给方法。White-space characters are defined by the Unicode standard and return `true` if they are passed to the method. 如果`separator`对此方法重载的调用中的参数是`null`，编译器重载决策失败。If the `separator` parameter in the call to this method overload is `null`, compiler overload resolution fails. 若要明确地标识所调用的方法，你的代码必须指示的一种`null`。To unambiguously identify the called method, your code must indicate the type of the `null`. 下面的示例演示通过多种方式来明确地标识此重载。The following example shows several ways to unambiguously identify this overload. [!code-csharp[System.String.Split#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/cs/split3.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.String.Split#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/vb/split3.vb#6)] ## 比较详细信息Comparison details 方法提取由一个或多个中的字符串分隔此字符串中子字符串`separator`参数，并将这些子字符串作为数组的元素返回。The method extracts the substrings in this string that are delimited by one or more of the strings in the `separator` parameter, and returns those substrings as elements of an array. 方法执行使用区分大小写的序号排序规则的比较，从而查找分隔符。The method looks for delimiters by performing comparisons using case-sensitive ordinal sort rules. 有关 word、 字符串和顺序排序的详细信息，请参阅枚举。For more information about word, string, and ordinal sorts, see the enumeration. 方法将忽略的任何元素`separator`其值是`null`或为空字符串 ("")。The method ignores any element of `separator` whose value is `null` or the empty string (""). 若要避免不明确的结果时中的字符串`separator`具有公共，字符操作进行从头到实例，值的结尾和匹配的第一个元素`separator`等于中的分隔符实例。To avoid ambiguous results when strings in `separator` have characters in common, the operation proceeds from the beginning to the end of the value of the instance, and matches the first element in `separator` that is equal to a delimiter in the instance. 在其中子字符串的实例中出现的顺序将优先于中的元素的顺序`separator`。The order in which substrings are encountered in the instance takes precedence over the order of elements in `separator`. 例如，考虑其值是"abcdef"的实例。For example, consider an instance whose value is "abcdef". 如果中的第一个元素`separator`为"简称 ef"，第二个元素为"bcde"，拆分操作的结果将是一个字符串数组，包含两个元素，"a"和"f"。If the first element in `separator` was "ef" and the second element was "bcde", the result of the split operation would be a string array that contains two elements, "a" and "f". 这是因为在实例中，"bcde"的子字符串遇到和匹配中的某个元素`separator`遇到的子字符串"f"之前。This is because the substring in the instance, "bcde", is encountered and matches an element in `separator` before the substring "f" is encountered. 但是，如果的第一个元素`separator`为"bcd"，第二个元素为"bc"，该拆分操作的结果将是一个字符串数组，包含两个元素，"a"和"ef"。However, if the first element of `separator` was "bcd" and the second element was "bc", the result of the split operation would be a string array that contains two elements, "a" and "ef". 这是因为"bcd"中的第一个分隔符`separator`与实例中的分隔符相匹配。This is because "bcd" is the first delimiter in `separator` that matches a delimiter in the instance. 如果已撤消的分隔符的顺序，因此第一个元素为"bc"，并且此第二个元素是"bcd"，结果将是一个字符串数组，包含两个元素，"a"和"def"。If the order of the separators was reversed so the first element was "bc" and the second element was "bcd", the result would be a string array that contains two elements, "a" and "def". ## 性能注意事项Performance considerations 方法返回的数组对象分配内存和每个数组元素的对象。The methods allocate memory for the returned array object and a object for each array element. 如果你的应用程序需要最佳性能，或你的应用程序管理内存分配至关重要，请考虑使用或方法，并选择性地方法，来查找字符串中的子字符串。If your application requires optimal performance or if managing memory allocation is critical in your application, consider using the or method, and optionally the method, to locate a substring within a string. 如果你拆分的字符串中的分隔符，使用或方法来查找字符串中的分隔符。If you are splitting a string at a separator character, use the or method to locate a separator character in the string. 如果你拆分的字符串中的分隔符字符串，使用或方法来查找分隔符字符串的第一个字符。If you are splitting a string at a separator string, use the or method to locate the first character of the separator string. 然后使用方法来确定该第一个字符后面的字符是否为等于其余的字符的分隔符字符串。Then use the method to determine whether the characters after that first character are equal to the remaining characters of the separator string. 此外，如果组相同的字符用于拆分中存在多个字符串方法调用，请考虑创建一个数组，并在每个方法调用中引用它。In addition, if the same set of characters is used to split strings in multiple method calls, consider creating a single array and referencing it in each method call. 从而大幅减少每个方法调用的其他系统开销。This significantly reduces the additional overhead of each method call. ## Examples 下面的示例演示返回通过调用的字符串数组中的差异方法替换其`options`参数等于和。The following example illustrates the difference in the arrays returned by calling a string's method with its `options` parameter equal to and . [!code-csharp[System.String.Split#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/cs/Split.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.String.Split#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/vb/Split.vb#1)] 下面的示例定义包括标点和空白字符的分隔符的数组。The following example defines an array of separators that include punctuation and white-space characters. 传递的值以及此数组到方法返回一个数组，其中包含从字符串的各单词。Passing this array along with a value of to the method returns an array that consists of the individual words from the string. [!code-csharp[System.String.Split#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/cs/split7.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.String.Split#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/vb/split7.vb#7)] 请注意，调用该方法`options`参数设置为。Note that the method is called with the `options` argument set to . 这可以防止返回的数组包括表示匹配标点符号和空白字符之间的空的子字符串的值。This prevents the returned array from including values that represent empty substring matches between punctuation marks and white-space characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的数组的元素中不包含分隔符字符。Delimiter characters are not included in the elements of the returned array. 如果此实例不包含任何中的字符`separator`，或`count`参数为 1，返回的数组包含一个包含此实例的单个元素。If this instance does not contain any of the characters in `separator`, or the `count` parameter is 1, the returned array consists of a single element that contains this instance. 如果`separator`参数是`null`或不包含任何字符，空白字符都被认为是分隔符。If the `separator` parameter is `null` or contains no characters, white-space characters are assumed to be the delimiters. 由 Unicode 标准和返回定义空白字符`true`如果它们传递给方法。White-space characters are defined by the Unicode standard and return `true` if they are passed to the method. 但是，如果`separator`对此方法重载的调用中的参数是`null`，编译器重载决策失败。However, if the `separator` parameter in the call to this method overload is `null`, compiler overload resolution fails. 若要明确地标识所调用的方法，你的代码必须指示 null 的类型。To unambiguously identify the called method, your code must indicate the type of the null. 下面的示例演示通过多种方式来明确地标识此重载。The following example shows several ways to unambiguously identify this overload. [!code-csharp[System.String.Split#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/cs/split3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.String.Split#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/vb/split3.vb#3)] 如果`count`参数为零，或`options`参数是和此实例的长度为零，则返回一个空数组。If the `count` parameter is zero, or the `options` parameter is and the length of this instance is zero, an empty array is returned. 每个元素`separator`定义单独的分隔符字符。Each element of `separator` defines a separate delimiter character. 如果`options`参数是，和两个分隔符是相邻或分隔符找到的开头或末尾此情况下，相应的数组元素都包含。If the `options` parameter is , and two delimiters are adjacent or a delimiter is found at the beginning or end of this instance, the corresponding array element contains . 如果有多个`count`个子字符串在此情况下，第一个`count`减去 1 的子字符串将返回在第一个`count`减 1 个元素的返回值，且其余的字符在此实例中返回的最后一个返回值的元素。If there are more than `count` substrings in this instance, the first `count` minus 1 substrings are returned in the first `count` minus 1 elements of the return value, and the remaining characters in this instance are returned in the last element of the return value. 如果`count`大于数量的子字符串，则返回可用的子字符串和不引发异常。If `count` is greater than the number of substrings, the available substrings are returned and no exception is thrown. ## 性能注意事项Performance Considerations 方法返回的数组对象分配内存和每个数组元素的对象。The methods allocate memory for the returned array object and a object for each array element. 如果你的应用程序需要最佳性能，或你的应用程序管理内存分配至关重要，请考虑使用或方法，并选择性地方法，来查找字符串中的子字符串。If your application requires optimal performance or if managing memory allocation is critical in your application, consider using the or method, and optionally the method, to locate a substring within a string. 如果你拆分的字符串中的分隔符，使用或方法来查找字符串中的分隔符。If you are splitting a string at a separator character, use the or method to locate a separator character in the string. 如果你拆分的字符串中的分隔符字符串，使用或方法来查找分隔符字符串的第一个字符。If you are splitting a string at a separator string, use the or method to locate the first character of the separator string. 然后使用方法来确定该第一个字符后面的字符是否为等于其余的字符的分隔符字符串。Then use the method to determine whether the characters after that first character are equal to the remaining characters of the separator string. 此外，如果组相同的字符用于拆分中存在多个字符串方法调用，请考虑创建一个数组，并在每个方法调用中引用它。In addition, if the same set of characters is used to split strings in multiple method calls, consider creating a single array and referencing it in each method call. 从而大幅减少每个方法调用的其他系统开销。This significantly reduces the additional overhead of each method call. ## Examples 下面的示例使用枚举，以包括或排除子字符串由生成方法。The following example uses the enumeration to include or exclude substrings generated by the method. [!code-cpp[string.split3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.split3/CPP/omit.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[string.split3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.split3/CS/omit.cs#1)] [!code-vb[string.split3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.split3/VB/omit.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 返回值的详细信息Return value details 返回的数组的元素中不包括分隔符字符串。Delimiter strings are not included in the elements of the returned array. 如果此实例不包含任何中的字符串`separator`，或`count`参数为 1，返回的数组包含一个包含此实例的单个元素。If this instance does not contain any of the strings in `separator`, or the `count` parameter is 1, the returned array consists of a single element that contains this instance. 如果`separator`参数是`null`或不包含任何字符，空白字符都被认为是分隔符。If the `separator` parameter is `null` or contains no characters, white-space characters are assumed to be the delimiters. 由 Unicode 标准和返回定义空白字符`true`如果它们传递给方法。White-space characters are defined by the Unicode standard and return `true` if they are passed to the method. 但是，如果`separator`对此方法重载的调用中的参数是`null`，编译器重载决策失败。However, if the `separator` parameter in the call to this method overload is `null`, compiler overload resolution fails. 若要明确地标识所调用的方法，你的代码必须指示的一种`null`。To unambiguously identify the called method, your code must indicate the type of the `null`. 下面的示例演示通过多种方式来明确地标识此重载。The following example shows several ways to unambiguously identify this overload. [!code-csharp[System.String.Split#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/cs/split3.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.String.Split#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Split/vb/split3.vb#4)] 如果`count`参数为零，或`options`参数是和此实例的长度为零，则返回一个空数组。If the `count` parameter is zero, or the `options` parameter is and the length of this instance is zero, an empty array is returned. 每个元素`separator`定义一个或多个字符组成的单独分隔符。Each element of `separator` defines a separate delimiter that consists of one or more characters. 如果`options`参数是，和两个分隔符是相邻或分隔符找到的开头或末尾此情况下，相应的数组元素都包含。If the `options` parameter is , and two delimiters are adjacent or a delimiter is found at the beginning or end of this instance, the corresponding array element contains . 如果有多个`count`个子字符串在此情况下，第一个`count`减去 1 的子字符串将返回在第一个`count`减 1 个元素的返回值，且其余的字符在此实例中返回的最后一个返回值的元素。If there are more than `count` substrings in this instance, the first `count` minus 1 substrings are returned in the first `count` minus 1 elements of the return value, and the remaining characters in this instance are returned in the last element of the return value. 如果`count`大于数量的子字符串，则返回可用的子字符串和不引发异常。If `count` is greater than the number of substrings, the available substrings are returned and no exception is thrown. ## 分隔符数组The separator array 如果任何中的元素`separator`包含的多个字符，将整个子字符串被视为分隔符。If any of the elements in `separator` consists of multiple characters, the entire substring is considered a delimiter. 例如，如果一个中的元素的`separator`为"10"，以尝试拆分字符串"This10is10a10string。"For example, if one of the elements in `separator` is "10", attempting to split the string "This10is10a10string." 返回此四个元素的数组: {"This"，"is"，"a"、"字符串。returns this four-element array: { "This", "is", "a", "string." }.}. ## 比较详细信息Comparison details 方法提取由一个或多个中的字符串分隔此字符串中子字符串`separator`参数，并将这些子字符串作为数组的元素返回。The method extracts the substrings in this string that are delimited by one or more of the strings in the `separator` parameter, and returns those substrings as elements of an array. 方法执行使用区分大小写的序号排序规则的比较，从而查找分隔符。The method looks for delimiters by performing comparisons using case-sensitive ordinal sort rules. 有关 word、 字符串和顺序排序的详细信息，请参阅枚举。For more information about word, string, and ordinal sorts, see the enumeration. 方法将忽略的任何元素`separator`其值是`null`或为空字符串 ("")。The method ignores any element of `separator` whose value is `null` or the empty string (""). 若要避免不明确的结果时中的字符串`separator`具有公共，字符方法将从头转到实例的值的末尾，并与匹配的第一个元素`separator`等于中的分隔符实例。To avoid ambiguous results when strings in `separator` have characters in common, the method proceeds from the beginning to the end of the value of the instance, and matches the first element in `separator` that is equal to a delimiter in the instance. 在其中子字符串的实例中出现的顺序将优先于中的元素的顺序`separator`。The order in which substrings are encountered in the instance takes precedence over the order of elements in `separator`. 例如，考虑其值是"abcdef"的实例。For example, consider an instance whose value is "abcdef". 如果中的第一个元素`separator`为"简称 ef"，第二个元素为"bcde"，该拆分操作的结果将是"a"和"f"。If the first element in `separator` was "ef" and the second element was "bcde", the result of the split operation would be "a" and "f". 这是因为在实例中，"bcde"的子字符串遇到和匹配中的某个元素`separator`遇到的子字符串"f"之前。This is because the substring in the instance, "bcde", is encountered and matches an element in `separator` before the substring "f" is encountered. 但是，如果的第一个元素`separator`为"bcd"，第二个元素为"bc"，该拆分操作的结果将是"a"和"ef"。However, if the first element of `separator` was "bcd" and the second element was "bc", the result of the split operation would be "a" and "ef". 这是因为"bcd"中的第一个分隔符`separator`与实例中的分隔符相匹配。This is because "bcd" is the first delimiter in `separator` that matches a delimiter in the instance. 如果已撤消的分隔符的顺序，因此第一个元素为"bc"，并且此第二个元素是"bcd"，结果将是"a"和"def"。If the order of the separators was reversed so the first element was "bc" and the second element was "bcd", the result would be "a" and "def". ## 性能注意事项Performance considerations 方法返回的数组对象分配内存和每个数组元素的对象。The methods allocate memory for the returned array object and a object for each array element. 如果你的应用程序需要最佳性能，或你的应用程序管理内存分配至关重要，请考虑使用或方法，并选择性地方法，来查找字符串中的子字符串。If your application requires optimal performance or if managing memory allocation is critical in your application, consider using the or method, and optionally the method, to locate a substring within a string. 如果你拆分的字符串中的分隔符，使用或方法来查找字符串中的分隔符。If you are splitting a string at a separator character, use the or method to locate a separator character in the string. 如果你拆分的字符串中的分隔符字符串，使用或方法来查找分隔符字符串的第一个字符。If you are splitting a string at a separator string, use the or method to locate the first character of the separator string. 然后使用方法来确定该第一个字符后面的字符是否为等于其余的字符的分隔符字符串。Then use the method to determine whether the characters after that first character are equal to the remaining characters of the separator string. 此外，如果组相同的字符用于拆分中存在多个字符串方法调用，请考虑创建一个数组，并在每个方法调用中引用它。In addition, if the same set of characters is used to split strings in multiple method calls, consider creating a single array and referencing it in each method call. 从而大幅减少每个方法调用的其他系统开销。This significantly reduces the additional overhead of each method call. ## Examples 下面的示例使用枚举，以包括或排除子字符串由生成方法。The following example uses the enumeration to include or exclude substrings generated by the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法比较`value`是相同的长度，作为此实例的开头处的子字符串到`value`，并返回指示它们是否相等。This method compares `value` to the substring at the beginning of this instance that is the same length as `value`, and returns an indication whether they are equal. 若要相等，`value`必须是空字符串 ()，必须是对此同一实例的引用，或者必须匹配此实例的开头。To be equal, `value` must be an empty string (), must be a reference to this same instance, or must match the beginning of this instance. 此方法执行使用当前区域性的单词 （区分大小写和区分区域性） 比较。This method performs a word (case-sensitive and culture-sensitive) comparison using the current culture. ## Examples 下面的示例定义`StripStartTags`使用方法方法移除 HTML 从字符串开头开始标记。The following example defines a `StripStartTags` method that uses the method to remove HTML start tags from the beginning of a string. 请注意，`StripStartTags`方法调用以递归方式来确保删除在行开头的多个 HTML 开始标记。Note that the `StripStartTags` method is called recursively to ensure that multiple HTML start tags at the beginning of the line are removed. 该示例不会删除在字符串中嵌入的 HTML 标记。The example does not remove HTML tags embedded in a string. span.span: As explained in [Best Practices for Using Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/best-practices-strings.md), we recommend that you avoid calling string comparison methods that substitute default values and instead call methods that require parameters to be explicitly specified.

span.span: if this instance begins with ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法进行比较`value`参数与此字符串的开头处的子字符串并返回一个值，指示它们是否相等。The method compares the `value` parameter to the substring at the beginning of this string and returns a value that indicates whether they are equal. 若要相等，`value`必须对此相同的字符串的引用，必须为空字符串 ("")，或者必须与此字符串的开头匹配。To be equal, `value` must be a reference to this same string, must be the empty string (""), or must match the beginning of this string. 执行比较的类型方法取决于值`comparisonType`参数。The type of comparison performed by the method depends on the value of the `comparisonType` parameter. 比较可以使用当前区域性的约定 (和) 或固定区域性 (和)，或可能包含的逐字符的码位比较 (或).The comparison can use the conventions of the current culture ( and ) or the invariant culture ( and ), or it can consist of a character-by-character comparison of code points ( or ). 比较也可以是区分大小写 (， ，或)，或者可以忽略大小写 (， ， )。The comparison can also be case-sensitive (, , or ), or it can ignore case (, , ). ## Examples 下面的示例搜索字符串"the"开头的词开头的较长字符串"The"。The following example searches for the string "the" at the beginning of a longer string that begins with the word "The". 如示例所示，对的调用输出执行不区分区域性的但区分大小写的比较的方法无法与此字符串中，匹配时执行区域性-和写-insensitive 比较的调用与字符串匹配。As the output from the example shows, a call to the method that performs a culture-insensitive but case-sensitive comparison fails to match the string, while a call that performs a culture- and case-insensitive comparison matches the string. [!code-cpp[System.String.StartsWith#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.startswith/cpp/StartsWith2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.String.StartsWith#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.startswith/cs/StartsWith2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.String.StartsWith#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.startswith/vb/StartsWith2.vb#2)] 下面的示例确定字符串是否以特定的子字符串开头。The following example determines whether a string starts with a particular substring. 它将初始化二维字符串数组。It initializes a two-dimensional string array. 第二个维度中的第一个元素包含一个字符串，第二个元素包含要搜索的第一个字符串的开头的字符串。The first element in the second dimension contains a string, and the second element contains the string to search for at the start of the first string. 区域性、 是否忽略大小写，和是否执行序号比较的选择会影响结果。The results are affected by the choice of culture, whether case is ignored, and whether an ordinal comparison is performed. 请注意，当字符串实例中包含连字，带有其连续字符的区分区域性的比较成功匹配。Note that when the string instance contains a ligature, culture-sensitive comparisons with its consecutive characters successfully match. [!code-cpp[System.String.StartsWith#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.startswith/cpp/startswith1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.String.StartsWith#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.startswith/cs/startswith1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.String.StartsWith#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.startswith/vb/startswith1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法比较`value`参数是相同的长度，作为此字符串的开头处的子字符串`value`，并返回一个值，指示它们是否相等。This method compares the `value` parameter to the substring at the beginning of this string that is the same length as `value`, and returns a value that indicates whether they are equal. 若要相等，`value`必须是空字符串 ()，必须是对此同一实例的引用，或者必须匹配此实例的开头。To be equal, `value` must be an empty string (), must be a reference to this same instance, or must match the beginning of this instance. 此方法执行使用指定的大小写和区域性的比较。This method performs a comparison using the specified casing and culture. ## Examples 下面的示例确定一个字符串是否出现在另一个字符串的开头。The following example determines whether a string occurs at the beginning of another string. 几次使用区分大小写、 区分大小写和影响搜索的结果的不同区域性调用方法。The method is called several times using case sensitivity, case insensitivity, and different cultures that influence the results of the search. remarks.format: ## Remarks 你调用方法以从指定的字符位置开始且在字符串的结尾结束的字符串中提取子字符串。You call the method to extract a substring from a string that begins at a specified character position and ends at the end of the string. 起始字符位置是从零开始;换而言之，在字符串中的第一个字符位于索引 0，不得索引 1 处。The starting character position is a zero-based; in other words, the first character in the string is at index 0, not index 1. 若要提取子字符串的指定的字符位置开始和结束之前到字符串的末尾，调用方法。To extract a substring that begins at a specified character position and ends before to the end of the string, call the method. > [!NOTE] > 此方法不会修改当前实例的值。This method does not modify the value of the current instance. 相反，它将返回一个新字符串，开始`startIndex`当前字符串中的位置。Instead, it returns a new string that begins at the `startIndex` position in the current string. 若要提取特定字符或字符序列开头的子字符串，调用方法如或若要获取的值`startIndex`。To extract a substring that begins with a particular character or character sequence, call a method such as or to get the value of `startIndex`. 第二个示例阐释了这一点;它提取一个密钥值，在"="字符之后开始一个字符位置。The second example illustrates this; it extracts a key value that begins one character position after the "=" character. 如果`startIndex`等于零，该方法将返回原始字符串保持不变。If `startIndex` is equal to zero, the method returns the original string unchanged. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取从字符串的子字符串。The following example demonstrates obtaining a substring from a string. [!code-cpp[System.String.Substring#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.String.Substring/cpp/Substring10.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.String.Substring#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.String.Substring/cs/Substring10.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.String.Substring#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.String.Substring/vb/Substring10.vb#10)] 下面的示例使用方法来分隔由等于分隔的键/值对 （"="） 字符。The following example uses the method to separate key/value pairs that are delimited by an equals ("=") character. [!code-csharp[System.String.Substring#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.String.Substring/cs/Substring1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.String.Substring#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.String.Substring/vb/Substring1.vb#1)] 方法用于获取字符串中的等号字符位置...The method is used to get the position of the equals character in the string.. 调用方法提取密钥名称。，可从字符串中的第一个字符开始并扩展它的调用返回的字符数方法。The call to the method extracts the key name., which starts from the first character in the string and extends for the number of characters returned by the call to the method. 调用方法则会提取分配给键的值。The call to the method then extracts the value assigned to the key. 它在等号字符之外的一个字符位置开始，并将扩展到字符串的末尾。It starts at one character position beyond the equals character and extends to the end of the string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你调用方法以从指定的字符位置开始和结束之前字符串末尾的字符串中提取子字符串。You call the method to extract a substring from a string that begins at a specified character position and ends before the end of the string. 起始字符位置是从零开始;换而言之，在字符串中的第一个字符位于索引 0，不得索引 1 处。The starting character position is a zero-based; in other words, the first character in the string is at index 0, not index 1. 若要提取子字符串从指定的字符位置开始并一直到字符串的末尾，调用方法。To extract a substring that begins at a specified character position and continues to the end of the string, call the method. > [!NOTE] > 此方法不会修改当前实例的值。This method does not modify the value of the current instance. 相反，它将返回的新字符串`length`字符从开始`startIndex`当前字符串中的位置。Instead, it returns a new string with `length` characters starting from the `startIndex` position in the current string. `length`参数表示要从当前的字符串实例中提取的字符总数。The `length` parameter represents the total number of characters to extract from the current string instance. 这包括在索引中找到的起始字符`startIndex`。This includes the starting character found at index `startIndex`. 换而言之，方法尝试从索引中提取字符`startIndex`到索引`startIndex` + `length` -1。In other words, the method attempts to extract characters from index `startIndex` to index `startIndex` + `length` - 1. 若要提取特定字符或字符序列开头的子字符串，调用方法如或若要获取的值`startIndex`。To extract a substring that begins with a particular character or character sequence, call a method such as or to get the value of `startIndex`. 如果子字符串从扩展`startIndex`到指定的字符序列，你可以调用一个方法如或若要获取的结束字符或字符序列的索引。If the substring extends from `startIndex` to a specified character sequence, you can call a method such as or to get the index of the ending character or character sequence. 你可以然后将该值转换到字符串中的索引位置，如下所示：You can then convert that value to an index position in the string as follows: - 如果已为单个字符，是标记的末尾的子字符串，搜索`length`参数等于`endIndex` - `startIndex` + 1，其中`endIndex`是返回值的或方法。If you've searched for a single character that is to mark the end of the substring, the `length` parameter equals `endIndex` - `startIndex` + 1, where `endIndex` is the return value of the or method. 下面的示例从字符串提取"b"字符的连续块。The following example extracts a continuous block of "b" characters from a string. [!code-csharp[System.String.Substring#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.String.Substring/cs/Substring2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.String.Substring#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.String.Substring/vb/Substring2.vb#2)] - 如果您已搜索多个字符的标记的末尾的子字符串，`length`参数等于`endIndex` + `endMatchLength` - `startIndex`，其中`endIndex`是的返回值或方法。 和`endMatchLength`是标记的子字符串末尾的字符序列的长度。If you've searched for multiple characters that are to mark the end of the substring, the `length` parameter equals `endIndex` + `endMatchLength` - `startIndex`, where `endIndex` is the return value of the or method., and `endMatchLength` is the length of the character sequence that marks the end of the substring. 下面的示例提取包含 XML 的文本块``元素。The following example extracts a block of text that contains an XML `` element. [!code-csharp[System.String.Substring#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.String.Substring/cs/Substring3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.String.Substring#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.String.Substring/vb/Substring3.vb#3)] - 如果字符或字符序列不包含的末尾的子字符串，在`length`参数等于`endIndex` - `startIndex`，其中`endIndex`是返回值的或方法。If the character or character sequence is not included in the end of the substring, the `length` parameter equals `endIndex` - `startIndex`, where `endIndex` is the return value of the or method. 如果`startIndex`等于零，并且等于当前的字符串，该方法的长度返回未更改的原始字符串。If `startIndex` is equal to zero and equals the length of the current string, the method returns the original string unchanged. ## Examples 下面的示例阐释了简单调用从字符串的第六个字符位置开始提取两个字符的方法 （即，在索引 5）。The following example illustrates a simple call to the method that extracts two characters from a string starting at the sixth character position (that is, at index five). [!code-csharp[System.String.Substring#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.String.Substring/cs/Substring4.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.String.Substring#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.String.Substring/vb/Substring4.vb#4)] 下面的示例使用在以下的三种情况下，若要隔离字符串内的子字符串的方法。The following example uses the method in the following three cases to isolate substrings within a string. 在两个情况下使用子字符串在比较中，并且第三个用例中，因为指定的参数无效引发异常。In two cases the substrings are used in comparisons, and in the third case an exception is thrown because invalid parameters are specified. - 它提取单个字符和字符串 （在索引 2） 中的第三个位置，并将其替换为"c"进行比较。It extracts the single character and the third position in the string (at index 2) and compares it with a "c". 此比较返回`true`。This comparison returns `true`. - 它提取开始 （索引 3） 处的字符串中的第四个位置零字符并将其传递给方法。It extracts zero characters starting at the fourth position in the string (at index 3) and passes it to the method. 这返回 true，因为调用方法返回。This returns true because the call to the method returns . - 它尝试提取一个字符在字符串中的第四个位置启动。It attempts to extract one character starting at the fourth position in the string. 由于该位置没有任何字符，方法调用将引发异常。Because there is no character at that position, the method call throws an exception. [!code-csharp[Classic String.Substring1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic String.Substring1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic String.Substring1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic String.Substring1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的示例使用方法来分隔由等于分隔的键/值对 （"="） 字符。The following example uses the method to separate key/value pairs that are delimited by an equals ("=") character. [!code-csharp[System.String.Substring#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.String.Substring/cs/Substring1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.String.Substring#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.String.Substring/vb/Substring1.vb#1)] 方法用于获取字符串中的等号字符位置...The method is used to get the position of the equals character in the string.. 调用方法提取密钥名称。，可从字符串中的第一个字符开始并扩展它的调用返回的字符数方法。The call to the method extracts the key name., which starts from the first character in the string and extends for the number of characters returned by the call to the method. 调用方法则会提取分配给键的值。The call to the method then extracts the value assigned to the key. 它在等号字符之外的一个字符位置开始，并将扩展到字符串的末尾。It starts at one character position beyond the equals character and extends to the end of the string.

summary.span: 将此实例中的字符复制到 Unicode 字符数组。

span.span: Copies the characters in this instance to a Unicode character array.

MemberSignature.Value: public char[] ToCharArray ();
.method public hidebysig instance char[] ToCharArray() cil managed
Public Function ToCharArray () As Char()
public: cli::array <char> ^ ToCharArray();

summary.span: 将此实例中的字符复制到 Unicode 字符数组。

span.span: Copies the characters in this instance to a Unicode character array.

returns.span: 元素为此实例的各字符的 Unicode 字符数组。

span.span: A Unicode character array whose elements are the individual characters of this instance.

returns.span: 如果此实例是空字符串，则返回的数组为空且长度为零。

span.span: If this instance is an empty string, the returned array is empty and has a zero length.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会复制每个字符 (即，每个对象) 中的字符数组的字符串。This method copies each character (that is, each object) in a string to a character array. 复制的第一个字符位于索引零的返回的字符数组中;复制的最后一个字符位于索引– 1。The first character copied is at index zero of the returned character array; the last character copied is at index – 1. 若要从字符数组中的字符创建一个字符串，请调用构造函数。To create a string from the characters in a character array, call the constructor. 若要创建包含字符串中的编码的字符的字节数组，实例化相应对象并调用其方法。To create a byte array that contains the encoded characters in a string, instantiate the appropriate object and call its method. 一些.NET Framework 中可用的标准编码包括以下：Some of the standard encodings available in the .NET Framework include the following: |编码Encoding|对象Object| |--------------|------------| |ASCIIASCII|| |UTF-7UTF-7|| |UTF-8UTF-8|| |UTF-16UTF-16|| |UTF-32UTF-32|| 有关详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 中的字符编码](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md)。For more information, see [Character Encoding in the .NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md). ## Examples 下面的示例调用方法以提取的字符数组的字符串中的字符。The following example calls the method to extract the characters in a string to a character array. 它将数组中显示原始字符串和元素。It then displays the original string and the elements in the array. [!code-csharp[System.String.ToCharArray#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.tochararray/cs/ToCharArray1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.String.ToCharArray#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.tochararray/vb/ToCharArray1.vb#1)] 下面的示例定义一个包含用作分隔符分隔的字符串中字符的字符串。The following example defines a string containing the characters that serve as delimiters in a delimited string. 然后，它调用方法用于创建字符数组，可传递给方法将单独分隔的字符串放入其单独的子字符串。It then calls the method to create a character array that can be passed to the method to separate the delimited string into its individual substrings. [!code-cpp[StringSplit2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StringSplit2/CPP/stringsplit2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StringSplit2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StringSplit2/CS/stringsplit2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StringSplit2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StringSplit2/VB/stringsplit2.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public char[] ToCharArray (int startIndex, int length);
.method public hidebysig instance char[] ToCharArray(int32 startIndex, int32 length) cil managed
Public Function ToCharArray (startIndex As Integer, length As Integer) As Char()
public: cli::array <char> ^ ToCharArray(int startIndex, int length);

param.name: startIndex
param.span: 此实例内子字符串的起始位置。

span.span: The starting position of a substring in this instance.

param.name: length
param.span: 此实例内子字符串的长度。

span.span: The length of the substring in this instance.

summary.span: 将此实例中的指定子字符串内的字符复制到 Unicode 字符数组。

span.span: Copies the characters in a specified substring in this instance to a Unicode character array.

returns.span: 元素为此实例中从字符位置 开始的 字符数的 Unicode 字符数组。

span.span: A Unicode character array whose elements are the number of characters in this instance starting from character position .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将字符串的部分中的字符复制到字符数组。This method copies the characters in a portion of a string to a character array. 若要创建从一系列字符数组中字符的字符串，调用构造函数。To create a string from a range of characters in a character array, call the constructor. `startIndex`参数是从零开始。The `startIndex` parameter is zero-based. 也就是说，在字符串实例中的第一个字符的索引为零。That is, the index of the first character in the string instance is zero. 如果`length`为零，则返回的数组为空并且具有长度为零。If `length` is zero, the returned array is empty and has a zero length. 如果此实例是`null`或空字符串 ("")，返回的数组为空并且具有长度为零。If this instance is `null` or an empty string (""), the returned array is empty and has a zero length. 若要创建包含已编码的字符字符串的部分中的字节数组，实例化相应对象并调用其方法。To create a byte array that contains the encoded characters in a portion of a string, instantiate the appropriate object and call its method. 一些.NET Framework 中可用的标准编码包括以下：Some of the standard encodings available in the .NET Framework include the following: |编码Encoding|对象Object| |--------------|------------| |ASCIIASCII|| |UTF-7UTF-7|| |UTF-8UTF-8|| |UTF-16UTF-16|| |UTF-32UTF-32|| 有关详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 中的字符编码](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md)。For more information, see [Character Encoding in the .NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md). ## Examples 下面的示例将一个字符串内的子字符串转换为数组的字符，然后枚举并显示该数组的元素。The following example converts a substring within a string to an array of characters, then enumerates and displays the elements of the array. [!code-cpp[string.tochararray1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.ToCharArray1/CPP/tocharry1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[string.tochararray1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.ToCharArray1/CS/tocharry1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[string.tochararray1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.ToCharArray1/VB/tocharry1.vb#1)]

span.span: or is less than zero.
-or-

exception.span: 加上 大于此实例的长度。

span.span: plus is greater than the length of this instance.

summary.span: 返回此字符串转换为小写形式的副本。

span.span: Returns a copy of this string converted to lowercase.

MemberSignature.Value: public string ToLower ();
.method public hidebysig instance string ToLower() cil managed
Public Function ToLower () As String
public: System::String ^ ToLower();

summary.span: 返回此字符串转换为小写形式的副本。

span.span: Returns a copy of this string converted to lowercase.

returns.span: 一个小写字符串。

span.span: A string in lowercase.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将当前区域性的大小写规则考虑在内。This method takes into account the casing rules of the current culture. > [!NOTE] > 此方法不会修改当前实例的值。This method does not modify the value of the current instance. 相反，它返回当前实例中的所有字符都转换为小写形式的新字符串。Instead, it returns a new string in which all characters in the current instance are converted to lowercase. ## 安全注意事项Security Considerations 调用得到的结果的大小写操作方法将当前区域性的大小写约定考虑在内。The casing operation that results from calling the method takes the casing conventions of the current culture into account. 如果你需要操作系统的标识符，如文件名、 小写或大写版本命名管道或注册表项，使用或方法。If you need the lowercase or uppercase version of an operating system identifier, such as a file name, named pipe, or registry key, use the or methods. 这将生成中每个区域性相同的结果 (与不同方法) 和更有效地执行。This produces the same result in every culture (unlike the method) and performs more efficiently. ## Examples 下面的示例将几个混合大小写的字符串转换为小写。The following example converts several mixed case strings to lowercase. [!code-cpp[stringlowerupper#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/stringlowerupper/CPP/stringtolower.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[stringlowerupper#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/stringlowerupper/CS/stringtolower.cs#1)] [!code-vb[stringlowerupper#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/stringlowerupper/VB/stringtolower.vb#1)]

para.span: 中所述[使用字符串的最佳实践](~/docs/standard/base-types/best-practices-strings.md)，我们建议你避免调用替换为默认值并改为调用需要使用参数来显式指定的方法的字符串的大小写方法。

span.span: As explained in [Best Practices for Using Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/best-practices-strings.md), we recommend that you avoid calling string casing methods that substitute default values and instead call methods that require parameters to be explicitly specified.

para.span: 若要为通过使用当前区域性的大小写约定小写的字符转换，调用的值的方法重载有关其参数。

span.span: To convert a character to lowercase by using the casing conventions of the current culture, call the method overload with a value of for its parameter.

returns.span: 当前字符串的等效小写形式。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的区域性的大小写规则`culture`参数确定更改字符串的大小写的方法。The casing rules of the culture specified by the `culture` parameter determine the way the case of the string is changed. > [!NOTE] > 此方法不会修改当前实例的值。This method does not modify the value of the current instance. 相反，它返回当前实例中的所有字符都转换为小写形式的新字符串。Instead, it returns a new string in which all characters in the current instance are converted to lowercase. ## 安全注意事项Security Considerations 如果你通过方法以外对象，大小写操作将考虑到的区域性特定的规则。If you pass the method a object other than , the casing operation will take culture-specific rules into account. 如果你需要操作系统的标识符，如文件名、 小写或大写版本命名管道或注册表项，使用或方法。If you need the lowercase or uppercase version of an operating system identifier, such as a file name, named pipe, or registry key, use the or method. 这产生中每个区域性相同的结果，它更有效地执行。This produces the same result in every culture and performs more efficiently. ## Examples 下面的示例将转换为小写字符使用美国英语和土耳其语-土耳其区域性的大写字符组成的两个字符串，然后对小写的字符串进行比较。The following example converts two strings of uppercase characters to lowercase characters using the English-United States and Turkish-Turkey cultures, then compares the lowercase strings. 大写字符串基本相同，只不过 Unicode LATIN CAPITAL LETTER I 在单个字符串中每个匹配项，另一个字符串包含 LATIN CAPITAL LETTER I 与点上方。The uppercase strings are identical except that for each occurrence of the Unicode LATIN CAPITAL LETTER I in one string, the other string contains LATIN CAPITAL LETTER I WITH DOT ABOVE. [!code-cpp[string.tolower1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.tolower1/CPP/tolower.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[string.tolower1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.tolower1/CS/tolower.cs#1)] [!code-vb[string.tolower1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.tolower1/VB/tolower.vb#1)]

summary.span: 返回此 对象的转换为小写形式的副本，返回时使用固定区域性的大小写规则。

span.span: Returns a copy of this object converted to lowercase using the casing rules of the invariant culture.

returns.span: 当前字符串的等效小写形式。

span.span: The lowercase equivalent of the current string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 固定区域性表示区域性的不区分区域性的。The invariant culture represents a culture that is culture-insensitive. 关联与英语语言，但不是与特定的国家 / 地区。It is associated with the English language but not with a specific country or region. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. 如果你的应用程序依赖于不受当前区域性使用的可预测方式更改字符串的大小写方法。If your application depends on the case of a string changing in a predictable way that is unaffected by the current culture, use the method. 方法相当于`ToLower(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)`。The method is equivalent to `ToLower(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)`. 一个字符串集合必须在用户界面控件中可预测的顺序出现时，建议的方法。The method is recommended when a collection of strings must appear in a predictable order in a user interface control. > [!NOTE] > 此方法不会修改当前实例的值。This method does not modify the value of the current instance. 相反，它返回当前实例中的所有字符都转换为小写形式的新字符串。Instead, it returns a new string in which all characters in the current instance are converted to lowercase. ## 安全注意事项Security Considerations 如果你需要操作系统的标识符，如文件名、 小写或大写版本命名管道或注册表项，使用或方法。If you need the lowercase or uppercase version of an operating system identifier, such as a file name, named pipe, or registry key, use the or methods. ## Examples 下面的示例定义包含大量的语言中使用的单个字符的字符串数组。The following example defines a string array that contains a single word in a number of languages. 方法用于填充与每个单词的不区分大小写版本并行数组的元素。The method is used to populate the elements of a parallel array with the case-insensitive version of each word. 方法用于区分大小写数组根据小写的数组，以确保无论何种语言的相同顺序出现元素中的元素的顺序排序。The method is used to sort the case-sensitive array based on the order of elements in the lowercase array to ensure that elements appear in the same order regardless of language. [!code-csharp[System.String.ToLowerInvariant#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.tolowerinvariant/cs/tolowerinvariant.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.String.ToLowerInvariant#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.tolowerinvariant/vb/tolowerinvariant.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法只返回未更改的当前字符串，因为没有无需直接调用。Because this method simply returns the current string unchanged, there is no need to call it directly. 它通常称为隐式中的复合格式设置操作，如示例所示。It is usually called implicitly in a composite formatting operation, as the example shows. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法。请注意，该示例不显式调用方法。The following example demonstrates the method.Note that the example does not explicitly call the method. 相反，此方法叫做隐式[复合格式设置](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)功能。Instead, the method is called implicitly by the [composite formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md) feature. [!code-cpp[string.tostring#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.tostring/CPP/string.tostring.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[string.tostring#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.tostring/CS/string.tostring.cs#1)] [!code-vb[string.tostring#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.tostring/VB/string.tostring.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `provider` 已保留，并且当前不参与此操作。`provider` is reserved, and does not currently participate in this operation. 此方法只返回未更改的当前字符串，因为没有无需直接调用。Because this method simply returns the current string unchanged, there is no need to call it directly.

MemberSignature.Value: public string ToUpper ();
.method public hidebysig instance string ToUpper() cil managed
Public Function ToUpper () As String
public: System::String ^ ToUpper();

summary.span: 返回此字符串转换为大写形式的副本。

span.span: Returns a copy of this string converted to uppercase.

returns.span: 当前字符串的大写形式。

span.span: The uppercase equivalent of the current string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用当前区域性的大小写规则将当前实例中的每个字符转换为其大写等效项。This method uses the casing rules of the current culture to convert each character in the current instance to its uppercase equivalent. 如果字符没有大写等效项，它将包括在返回的字符串中不变。If a character does not have an uppercase equivalent, it is included unchanged in the returned string. > [!NOTE] > 此方法不会修改当前实例的值。This method does not modify the value of the current instance. 相反，它返回当前实例中的所有字符都转换为大写的新字符串。Instead, it returns a new string in which all characters in the current instance are converted to uppercase. 方法通常用于将字符串转换为大写形式，以便可以在不区分大小写比较中使用它。The method is often used to convert a string to uppercase so that it can be used in a case-insensitive comparison. 执行不区分大小写的比较更好的方法是调用具有的字符串比较方法参数设置为其值有关的区分区域性的、 不区分大小写的比较。A better method to perform case-insensitive comparison is to call a string comparison method that has a parameter whose value you set to for a culture-sensitive, case-insensitive comparison. ## 安全注意事项Security Considerations 调用得到的结果的大小写操作方法将当前区域性的大小写约定考虑在内。The casing operation that results from calling the method takes the casing conventions of the current culture into account. 如果你需要操作系统的标识符，如文件名、 小写或大写版本命名管道或注册表项，使用或方法。If you need the lowercase or uppercase version of an operating system identifier, such as a file name, named pipe, or registry key, use the or method. 这将生成中每个区域性相同的结果 (与不同方法) 和更有效地执行。This produces the same result in every culture (unlike the method) and performs more efficiently. ## Examples 下面的示例调用方法来转换包含基本拉丁，Latin 1 补充和拉丁语扩展 A 字符集中的每个字符的单字符字符串的一系列。The following example calls the method to convert a series of one-character strings that contain each character in the Basic Latin, Latin-1 Supplement, and Latin Extended-A character sets. 然后，它将显示每个字符串的大写字符是不同于它的小写字符。It then displays each string whose uppercase character is different from its lowercase character. [!code-cpp[System.String.ToUpper#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.ToUpper/cpp/ToUpperEx.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.String.ToUpper#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.ToUpper/cs/ToUpperEx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.String.ToUpper#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.ToUpper/vb/ToUpperEx.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string Trim ();
.method public hidebysig instance string Trim() cil managed
Public Function Trim () As String
public: System::String ^ Trim();

summary.span: 从当前 对象移除所有前导空白字符和尾部空白字符。

span.span: Removes all leading and trailing white-space characters from the current object.

returns.span: 从当前字符串的开头和结尾删除所有空白字符后剩余的字符串。

span.span: The string that remains after all white-space characters are removed from the start and end of the current string.

returns.span: 如果从当前实例无法删除字符，此方法返回未更改的当前实例。

span.span: If no characters can be trimmed from the current instance, the method returns the current instance unchanged.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从字符串中删除当前所有前导和尾随空白字符。The method removes from the current string all leading and trailing white-space characters. 每个前导和尾随剪裁操作停止时遇到非空白字符。Each leading and trailing trim operation stops when a non-white-space character is encountered. 例如，如果当前字符串"abc x y z"方法将返回"abc x y z"。For example, if the current string is " abc xyz ", the method returns "abc xyz". 若要删除字符串中的单词之间的空白字符，请使用[.NET Framework 正则表达式](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md)。To remove white-space characters between words in a string, use a [.NET Framework Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果方法从当前实例中删除任何字符，此方法不会修改当前实例的值。If the method removes any characters from the current instance, this method does not modify the value of the current instance. 相反，它返回一个新字符串，会在当前实例中找到的所有前导和尾随空白字符。Instead, it returns a new string in which all leading and trailing white space characters found in the current instance are removed. 如果当前字符串等于或当前实例中的所有字符由空白字符都组成，该方法返回。If the current string equals or all the characters in the current instance consist of white-space characters, the method returns . 由 Unicode 标准定义空白字符。White-space characters are defined by the Unicode standard. 方法可以删除生成的返回值的任何前导和尾随字符`true`时传递给方法。The method removes any leading and trailing characters that produce a return value of `true` when they are passed to the method. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法从用户输入的之前将它们连接起来的字符串中移除任何多余的空白区域。The following example uses the method to remove any extra white space from strings entered by the user before concatenating them. [!code-cpp[System.String.Trim#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Trim/cpp/trim2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.String.Trim#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Trim/cs/Trim2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.String.Trim#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Trim/vb/Trim2.vb#2)]

para.span: [!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_short](~/includes/net-v35sp1-short-md.md)]和早期版本维护此方法修整的空白字符的内部列表。

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_short](~/includes/net-v35sp1-short-md.md)] and earlier versions maintain an internal list of white-space characters that this method trims.

para.span: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，该方法将修整所有 Unicode 空白字符 (即字符生成返回值传递给方法)。

span.span: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the method trims all Unicode white-space characters (that is, characters that produce a return value when they are passed to the method).

para.span: 由于此更改，中的方法[!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_short](~/includes/net-v35sp1-short-md.md)]和早期版本中移除两个字符，零宽度空格 (U + 200B) 和零宽度无中断空格 (U + FEFF)，中的方法[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]以及更高版本不是删除。

span.span: Because of this change, the method in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_short](~/includes/net-v35sp1-short-md.md)] and earlier versions removes two characters, ZERO WIDTH SPACE (U+200B) and ZERO WIDTH NO-BREAK SPACE (U+FEFF), that the method in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]and later versions does not remove.

para.span: 此外，中的方法[!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_short](~/includes/net-v35sp1-short-md.md)]和早期版本不会修整三个 Unicode 空白字符： 蒙古语元音分隔符 (U + 180E)、 窄无中断空格 (U + 202F) 和中等数学空间 (U + 205F)。

span.span: In addition, the method in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_short](~/includes/net-v35sp1-short-md.md)] and earlier versions does not trim three Unicode white-space characters: MONGOLIAN VOWEL SEPARATOR (U+180E), NARROW NO-BREAK SPACE (U+202F), and MEDIUM MATHEMATICAL SPACE (U+205F).

MemberSignature.Value: public string Trim (char trimChar);
.method public hidebysig instance string Trim(char trimChar) cil managed
Public Function Trim (trimChar As Char) As String
public: System::String ^ Trim(char trimChar);
public string Trim (params char[] trimChars);
.method public hidebysig instance string Trim(char[] trimChars) cil managed
Public Function Trim (ParamArray trimChars As Char()) As String
public: System::String ^ Trim(... cli::array <char> ^ trimChars);

param.name: trimChars
param.span: 要删除的 Unicode 字符的数组，或 。

span.span: An array of Unicode characters to remove, or .

summary.span: 从当前 对象移除数组中指定的一组字符的所有前导匹配项和尾部匹配项。

span.span: Removes all leading and trailing occurrences of a set of characters specified in an array from the current object.

returns.span: 从当前字符串的开头移除所出现的所有 参数中的字符后剩余的字符串。

span.span: The string that remains after all occurrences of the characters in the parameter are removed from the start and end of the current string.

returns.span: 如果 为 或空数组，则改为移除空白字符。

span.span: If is or an empty array, white-space characters are removed instead.

returns.span: 如果从当前实例无法删除字符，此方法返回未更改的当前实例。

span.span: If no characters can be trimmed from the current instance, the method returns the current instance unchanged.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以删除从当前字符串中的所有前导和尾随字符`trimChars`参数。The method removes from the current string all leading and trailing characters that are in the `trimChars` parameter. 每个前导空格和尾随 trim 操作停止时将不在字符`trimChars`遇到。Each leading and trailing trim operation stops when a character that is not in `trimChars` is encountered. 例如，如果当前的字符串为"123abc456xyz789"和`trimChars`包含从"1"至"9"的数字方法将返回"abc456xyz"。For example, if the current string is "123abc456xyz789" and `trimChars` contains the digits from "1" through "9", the method returns "abc456xyz". > [!NOTE] > 如果方法从当前实例中删除任何字符，此方法不会修改当前实例的值。If the method removes any characters from the current instance, this method does not modify the value of the current instance. 相反，它将返回一个新字符串，所有前导空格和尾随`trimChars`移除了当前实例中找到的字符。Instead, it returns a new string in which all leading and trailing `trimChars` characters found in the current instance are removed. 如果当前字符串等于或当前实例中的所有字符中的字符都组成`trimChars`数组，该方法返回。If the current string equals or all the characters in the current instance consist of characters in the `trimChars` array, the method returns . 如果`trimChars`是`null`或空数组，此方法可以删除导致方法返回任何前导或尾随字符`true`时传递给方法，If `trimChars` is `null` or an empty array, this method removes any leading or trailing characters that result in the method returning `true` when they are passed to the method, ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法从字符串中移除空间、 星号 （\*） 和撇号 （'） 字符。The following example uses the method to remove space, asterisk (\*), and apostrophe (') characters from a string. [!code-cpp[System.String.Trim#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Trim/cpp/trim1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.String.Trim#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Trim/cs/Trim1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.String.Trim#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Trim/vb/Trim1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以删除从当前字符串中的所有尾随字符`trimChars`参数。The method removes from the current string all trailing characters that are in the `trimChars` parameter. 剪裁操作就会停止在第一个字符不是在`trimChars`遇到在字符串的末尾。The trim operation stops when the first character that is not in `trimChars` is encountered at the end of the string. 例如，如果当前的字符串为"123abc456xyz789"和`trimChars`包含从"1"至"9"的数字方法将返回"123abc456xyz"。For example, if the current string is "123abc456xyz789" and `trimChars` contains the digits from "1" through "9", the method returns "123abc456xyz". > [!NOTE] > 如果方法从当前实例中删除任何字符，此方法不会修改当前实例的值。If the method removes any characters from the current instance, this method does not modify the value of the current instance. 相反，它返回一个新字符串中找到的所有尾随字符中`trimChars`从当前字符串删除。Instead, it returns a new string in which all trailing characters found in `trimChars` are removed from the current string. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法，以修整空格或标点符号从字符串的末尾。The following example demonstrates how you can use the method to trim white space or punctuation marks from the end of a string. param.name: trimChars
param.span: 要删除的 Unicode 字符的数组，或 。

span.span: An array of Unicode characters to remove, or .

summary.span: 从当前 对象移除数组中指定的一组字符的所有前导匹配项。

span.span: Removes all leading occurrences of a set of characters specified in an array from the current object.

returns.span: 从当前字符串的开头移除所出现的所有 参数中的字符后剩余的字符串。

span.span: The string that remains after all occurrences of characters in the parameter are removed from the start of the current string.

returns.span: 如果 为 或空数组，则改为移除空白字符。

span.span: If is or an empty array, white-space characters are removed instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以删除从当前字符串中的所有前导字符`trimChars`参数。The method removes from the current string all leading characters that are in the `trimChars` parameter. 剪裁操作停止时将不在字符`trimChars`遇到。The trim operation stops when a character that is not in `trimChars` is encountered. 例如，如果当前的字符串为"123abc456xyz789"和`trimChars`包含从"1"至"9"的数字方法将返回"abc456xyz789"。For example, if the current string is "123abc456xyz789" and `trimChars` contains the digits from "1" through "9", the method returns "abc456xyz789". > [!NOTE] > 如果方法从当前实例中删除任何字符，此方法不会修改当前实例的值。If the method removes any characters from the current instance, this method does not modify the value of the current instance. 相反，它返回一个新字符串，会在当前实例中找到的所有前导空白字符。Instead, it returns a new string in which all leading white space characters found in the current instance are removed. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法，以修整空格和从代码的源代码行的注释字符。The following example uses the method to trim white space and comment characters from lines of source code. `StripComments`方法包装对的调用并将其传递在 Visual Basic 和 C# 中的斜杠 （/） 中包含一个空格和注释字符，这是单引号 （'） 的字符数组。The `StripComments` method wraps a call to and passes it a character array that contains a space and the comment character, which is an apostrophe ( ' ) in Visual Basic and a slash ( / ) in C#. 方法也称为若要评估一个字符串是否为注释中删除前导空白字符。The method is also called to remove leading white space when evaluating whether a string is a comment. [!code-csharp[System.String.TrimStart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.TrimStart/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.String.TrimStart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.TrimStart/vb/sample.vb#1)] 下面的示例因而演示 `StripComments` 方法的调用。The following example then illustrates a call to the `StripComments` method. [!code-csharp[System.String.TrimStart#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.TrimStart/cs/sample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.String.TrimStart#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.TrimStart/vb/sample.vb#2)]
